title: Magdalena Biejat: People must always be at the centre of politics
description: I think that in 2024 in Warsaw I showed that I can effectively compete with Rafał Trzaskowski and I am ready for the next round at the national level – Magdalena Biejat, the New Left candidate for president, tells “Rzeczpospolita”.

title: Shopping left scattered on the crosswalk. Police looking for driver who hit 14-year-old with minibus and fled
description: The police are looking for the driver of a white or grey van who hit a 14-year-old boy on a marked crossing in Warsaw's Wola district on Friday. He left the scene without providing help. The boy was taken to hospital in critical condition. He died that night.

title: Marek Kozubal: Macierewicz, diplomatic betrayal and the Russians
description: The risk taken by General Jarosław Stróżyk by pointing to Macierewicz as a potential perpetrator of "diplomatic betrayal" may turn against him or... strengthen the state.

title: Donald Tusk sharply criticized Nawrocki. "The question is simple and deadly serious"
description: Donald Tusk has sharply criticized the absence of PiS-backed presidential candidate Karol Nawrocki at the opening ceremony of Poland's presidency of the European Union. "The question is simple and deadly serious: do you want a president who builds a safe and strong Europe, or one who, together with Putin and his allies, will destroy it?" he asked in a post on social media.

title: Survey: Poles on the state of the rule of law in Poland after a year of Donald Tusk's rule
description: "How, in your opinion, has the rule of law in Poland changed after a year of Donald Tusk's government being in power?" - this is the question we asked in the SW Research survey for rp.pl.

title: Reactive, ill-considered, without an idea. Such was the historical policy in 2024. What will it be like in this one?
description: The 80th anniversary of the end of World War II will most likely pass in an atmosphere of conflict rather than becoming a major international event.

title: Donald Tusk: If Europe is powerless, it will not survive
description: The ceremonial inauguration of the Polish presidency of the Council of the European Union took place at the Grand Theatre in Warsaw. - On 21 January, I will present the ambitious plans of the EU, the whole of Europe and the Polish presidency for these exceptionally difficult 6 months to the European Parliament - said Prime Minister Donald Tusk.

title: The Institute of National Remembrance is checking who took part in the executions
description: The prosecutor's office of the Institute of National Remembrance is trying to establish the circumstances of the crimes committed by the Germans against Poles and Jews during World War II.

title: Political Michałki: The new year begins, the National Electoral Commission with a hot potato, the refrigerator returns to politics
description: The new year in politics began with confusion over the decision of the National Electoral Commission and the controversy surrounding Marcin Romanowski. Will the disputes over the National Electoral Commission define the presidential campaign? How does the Romanowski case affect the image of PiS? What does the "political fridge" mean in an election year?

title: Inauguration of the Polish Presidency of the Council of the European Union without Andrzej Duda
description: President Andrzej Duda will not attend the inauguration ceremony of the Polish Presidency of the Council of the European Union at the Grand Theatre. "For the organizers, it was not an important event," said Małgorzata Paprocka, head of the Chancellery of the President.

title: "A state within a state". The president has made a sports field available to residents. He may end up in jail
description: The "Orlik" pitch in Puławy had to limit its activities a few years ago because a couple living next door complained about the noise. Now the city's president may end up in jail.

title: Paweł Szefernaker: Karol Nawrocki's presidential campaign financing? PiS was robbed
description: Paweł Szefernaker, who heads Karol Nawrocki's campaign team, said in an interview with Wirtualna Polska that the next stage of the election campaign of Karol Nawrocki - the PiS-supported presidential candidate - will begin soon, on January 6.

title: Prof. Antoni Dudek assesses that politics is approaching the limit. "Power may be the deciding factor"
description: Growing political tensions in Poland may make it difficult to organize the presidential elections in 2025, says political scientist and historian Prof. Antoni Dudek, considering it "questionable" whether they can be held in such a way that no one questions the result.

title: Ukrainians receive letters regarding mobilization. "It's a fake," the authorities assure
description: "In connection with the received signal about a fake letter sent to a citizen of Ukraine, the Office for Foreigners clarifies that it is not the author of the summons to perform military service," the office announced on its website.

title: Orlen without Formula 1 and the Polish Olympic Committee. A bit of common sense, a bit of politics
description: Orlen withdrew from sponsoring the Formula 1 team and financing the Polish Olympic Committee at the end of the year. Does this mean that the fuel company is giving up on supporting Polish sports?

title: Marcelina Zawisza on Zandberg's candidacy: The decision will be made by the National Council of the Razem party
description: Democracy is not about being either with Kaczyński or with Tusk and having to choose. Democracy is about being a democratic, opposition party in relation to one government and to the other government - said Razem MP Marcelina Zawisza on Polsat News.

title: The head of the Chancellery of the Prime Minister revealed when the Minister of Finance will speak out on the issue of money for PiS
description: Jan Grabiec, head of the Chancellery of the Prime Minister, told TVN24 when we can expect the Minister of Finance to speak out on the payment of funds to PiS for the 2023 parliamentary campaign. - I spoke with Andrzej Domański and I know that he is working on solving the Gordian knot that the Supreme Court woven by appointing neo-judges to rule on the PiS report, and later the National Electoral Commission - he emphasized.

title: Krzysztof Bosak on Rafał Trzaskowski. "This man is dangerous"
description: It is not Donald Tusk who will face consequences for his posts on social media, but Minister Andrzej Domański may be charged, assessed Deputy Speaker of the Sejm Krzysztof Bosak on radio station Trójka.

title: Poland does not want the Hungarian ambassador to be present at the inauguration of the EU presidency
description: Minister of Foreign Affairs Radosław Sikorski has sent a special note to the Hungarian embassy in Poland, which states that the participation of the Hungarian ambassador in the ceremonial inauguration of the Polish presidency of the EU "is not planned", Onet reports.

title: Michał Szułdrzyński: Poland's EU Presidency. It is not a six-month festival, but a tool for building Poland's role in Europe
description: Making good use of the presidency will allow Warsaw to confirm and strengthen the greater role of Poland and its leaders in Europe. However, we need to move from rounded slogans to real actions, such as urgently increasing security in the Baltic Sea.

title: Estera Flieger: Mamy za co chwalić III RP
description: Populists want to rely on ignorance: we praise too rarely what works. Meanwhile, we have something to appreciate about the Third Republic.

title: The shadow of the National Electoral Commission and the Supreme Court over the presidential campaign
description: Regardless of the final decisions, the dispute over money for PiS and uncertainty about the Supreme Court hang over the presidential campaign that is about to begin. What will the upcoming events bring?

title: Can Russians impersonate RCB Alert?
description: Incidents such as damage to optical fibers are analyzed in the context of potential hybrid activities, says Zbigniew Muszyński, director of the Government Security Center.

title: The problem of Polish drivers driving too fast is growing. Latest data
description: Drivers are not giving up on fast driving – the number of those who lost their driving license for speeding increased by almost 10%. There were five hundred more accidents, slightly fewer fatalities – this is the preliminary balance for 2024.

title: Adrian Zandberg on the presidential election: Opening the gates of hell
description: I am interested in the stability of these elections that are ahead of us. Because I do not want them to be decided not at the ballot box, but on the street - said Adrian Zandberg, co-leader of the Razem Party, on Polsat News.

title: Art 2024. A time of exhibition changes and personnel changes in museums and galleries
description: Contemporary art regained its full voice at exhibitions in 2024. And a major airing out of directors' offices began in museums and galleries.

title: Jacek Nizinkiewicz: Three ministers on whom the fate of Donald Tusk's government depends
description: The Ministers of Finance, Foreign Affairs and Justice will be the ones whose decisions will be crucial for the fate of the coalition on October 15. If they make mistakes, the government may not survive. The first perturbations ahead of Andrzej Domański after the decision of the National Electoral Commission.

title: There will be 100 million PLN for the Warsaw Uprising Museum
description: The Ministry of Culture has been co-running the Warsaw Uprising Museum since the beginning of this year. It has declared that it will provide money for the expansion of the facility.

title: Marcin Romanowski has made a decision on his status. "I have renounced"
description: It is not Tusk's "eye" or Bodnar's private opinions, but the Constitution that decides what is law in Poland. Stop Tusk's lawlessness - wrote Marcin Romanowski, former deputy minister of justice, on X, resigning from the status of a professional MP and receiving remuneration from the Chancellery of the Sejm.

title: Is real winter coming? A sudden cooling is ahead. Weather for the coming days
description: The weather outside the window is currently shaped by high-pressure wedges and low-pressure systems that alternately cover our country. However, from Friday, air masses of Arctic origin will begin to flow into us.

title: Kaczyński has nothing to reproach himself for regarding picnics. "The money would have been spent anyway"
description: PiS chairman Jarosław Kaczyński has nothing to reproach himself for when it comes to organizing military picnics before the 2023 parliamentary elections, where he openly encouraged people to vote for his party. He argued that the money planned for this purpose would have been spent anyway, so "the state did not lose anything."

title: Jarosław Kaczyński about Prof. Antoni Dudek: When he was young, he was very wrong
description: - Mr. (Antoni) Dudek may have personal grievances, this is the world of historians - said PiS chairman Jarosław Kaczyński, asked at a conference about the criticism of Karol Nawrocki, the chairman of the Institute of National Remembrance and the presidential candidate supported by PiS, formulated by the historian and political scientist.

title: Kaczyński criticizes Tusk for high prices. A refrigerator was brought to the conference
description: – We have a phenomenon that is simply called high prices. It is not that it could not have been prevented in any way. It could have been prevented – said PiS chairman Jarosław Kaczyński at a press conference.

title: We know how many soldiers took off their uniforms this year. As many as during Błaszczak's time
description: The number of soldiers in the Polish Army is growing. However, the new government has not managed to reverse the trend of large departures from service, which grew under the previous government. The most numerous are soldiers of the Territorial Defense Forces.

title: Krzysztof Bosak: Money for PiS? The Minister of Finance is in a difficult situation, but he should pay
description: - If the National Electoral Commission passed a resolution, which it was obliged to do, which is directly stated in the Electoral Code, then the earlier delay was unlawful, and the Minister of Finance should have done it - said Deputy Speaker of the Sejm Krzysztof Bosak (Confederation) in an interview with Polsat News, commenting on the National Electoral Commission resolution on the PiS financial report.

title: Prof. Antoni Dudek warns against Karol Nawrocki. "Ruthless, no inhibitions"
description: - Karol Nawrocki is a ruthless man, determined to succeed, and so far he has been going from success to success - says Professor Antoni Dudek about the president of the IPN, the presidential candidate supported by PiS.

title: Political Calendar for 2025: Elections, Anniversaries, Presidency and Rule of Law
description: In Polish politics, the year will be dominated by the presidential elections, which will take place in May 2025. The first event of the new political season will be their announcement. But that is not the only thing that is in the focus of politicians and campaign staff in 2025.

title: Drunk soldier escapes border with weapon and shoots at private car. "He was detained"
description: A soldier guarding the Polish-Belarusian border fired at a car in the town of Mielnik in Podlaskie Province, in which a father and his teenage daughter were traveling. "The man was captured by soldiers of the Task Force in Mielnik," the Operational Command of the Armed Forces reported.

title: "Busy night" for firefighters, police and paramedics. More fires than a year ago
description: Nearly 1,200 fires, almost twice as many as a year ago; 14,862 police interventions, many injured in accidents caused by exploding firecrackers. It was a busy night for the fire department, police and paramedics.

title: Michał Szułdrzyński: New Year's message and wishes of politicians like a declaration of Polish-Polish war
description: President Andrzej Duda and Prime Minister Donald Tusk, in addition to extending New Year's wishes, talked a lot about the 2025 presidential elections. Both presented them as the culmination of the political conflict to date. Will we survive a year of further deepening divisions?

title: Kazimierz Groblewski: National bets for the New Year 2025 – will the minister send a transfer to PiS or not?
description: Making a transfer to PiS, i.e. doing his job by the Minister of Finance Andrzej Domański, could mean – sooner or later – his resignation. This is the scale of the collapse of the state and Polish democracy.

title: New hope for the new year
description: Peace around our borders, which we long for; more understanding for others, which we need...

title: President's New Year's Address: Andrzej Duda Speaks of "Disturbing Signals" for Poland
description: President Andrzej Duda delivered a New Year's address in which he said, among other things, that Russia cannot win a war with Ukraine. The president criticized delays in the construction of the CPK and the nuclear power plant, pointed to the record-high budget deficit and assessed that the ruling coalition had led to chaos in the justice system.

title: Piotr Pytlakowski is dead. The famous investigative journalist was 73 years old
description: Piotr Pytlakowski, an investigative journalist, author and screenwriter, has died at the age of 73 after a long illness.

title: Resignation in the Ministry of Culture. It is known who will take over Andrzej Wyrobiec's departments
description: Undersecretary of State in the Ministry of Culture and National Heritage Andrzej Wyrobiec has resigned from his position. The ministry has announced who will take over supervision of the departments he coordinated.

title: Rafał Trzaskowski announces 5 percent of GDP for the military. "Security is the most important"
description: The year 2025 presents us with a great task, which is to rebuild the national community (...) Let us not allow ourselves to be divided any longer - let us recreate the community, because it is the strongest element of the state - emphasized Rafał Trzaskowski, the KO candidate for president, in his New Year's speech.

title: Donald Tusk: Until July we will remain in a system of law and lawlessness at the same time
description: It is hard to put up with a prime minister who is stubborn and organizes government meetings on Christmas Eve and New Year's Eve. These days are working days for all working people, including ladies and gentlemen ministers - said Prime Minister Donald Tusk before the government meeting. The prime minister announced that 2025 will be a time of breakthrough.

title: Poll: Is Donald Tusk a good prime minister? We know what Poles think
description: Almost half – 48.7 percent – ​​of respondents are critical of Donald Tusk as prime minister, according to a United Surveys poll for the wp.pl portal. The head of government is viewed negatively by as many as 95 percent of PiS and Confederation voters.

title: Morawiecki: Money will be found. Tusk and Domański have no movement
description: If Finance Minister Andrzej Domański does not pay the money to Law and Justice, he will face the State Tribunal in the future, says former Prime Minister Mateusz Morawiecki, commenting on Monday's decision of the National Electoral Commission on the report of Jarosław Kaczyński's party.

title: Who gained and who lost the most in national politics in 2024?
description: Two election campaigns, the beginning of the clash for the Presidential Palace, tensions in the government and coalition, settling accounts with the previous government, geopolitics, the war in Ukraine – it is hard to believe that all these events have taken place in the last 12 months. Who has gained politically this year and who cannot consider it a success?

title: The biggest scandals of 2024. From the release of a Russian spy to the escape of Marcin Romanowski
description: Settling accounts with the Justice Fund with politics in the background, the diploma scandal at Collegium Humanum and the state's strategic purchases for its own people – what were we living through in 2024?

title: Donald Tusk lacked instinct and restraint
description: Putting the finance minister in a difficult position, quoting words that for years brought only defeats to his own political camp and escalation of the Polish-Polish war, in other words Donald Tusk scores a hat trick after the decision of the National Electoral Commission. The prime minister scored all three goals in his own net.

title: A hanukkah was set on fire in the Sejm. Grzegorz Braun protests with fire extinguishers in front of the Sejm
description: On the occasion of the beginning of the Hanukkah holiday, a candle was lit in the Sejm, as every year, on the traditional hanukkiah. Grzegorz Braun protested this time in front of the Sejm with a group of supporters.

title: Ryszard Kalisz: The Minister of Finance should not pay subsidies to PiS
description: Please ask your colleagues why other members of the National Electoral Commission voted in favour of adopting the report or abstained from voting, said Ryszard Kalisz, a member of the National Electoral Commission, in "Kropka nad I".

title: Jacek Nizinkiewicz: The National Electoral Commission was right to accept the PiS financial report. But that's not the end
description: Taking away the subsidy from the largest opposition party would be part of the worst practices of undemocratic governments. PiS should be punished for its mistakes, but it's good that the subsidy was not taken away in its entirety. Now it's time to depoliticize the National Electoral Commission.

title: The head of government accepts the decision of the National Electoral Commission. "There is no money and there will be no money"
description: Prime Minister Donald Tusk commented in a short post on social media on the decision made today by the National Electoral Commission, accepting the financial report of Law and Justice.

title: Incorrect checkerboard? Experts point out error in marking of Polish fighters
description: The government has submitted a bill to the Sejm that would allow the use of a "low visibility" aviation checkerboard, i.e. in shades of grey, on F-35 aircraft. It ignored the voices of heraldists that it would be painted correctly only on half of the aircraft – "Rzeczpospolita" has learned.

title: After the National Electoral Commission's decision. PiS politicians see the finance minister before the Supreme Court. "Things will be back to normal"
description: The National Electoral Commission has adopted the financial report of Law and Justice. This decision paves the way for the payment of the full subsidy to Jarosław Kaczyński's party. PiS politicians are directing demands to the Minister of Finance.

title: The Minister of Finance said a few days ago: I am implementing the resolutions of the National Electoral Commission
description: - The Minister of Finance implements the resolutions of the National Electoral Commission, there is no discretion on my part here - said Finance Minister Andrzej Domański on Polsat News on December 23.

title: Poll: Poles have assessed the government and the prime minister. Donald Tusk has no reason to be happy
description: In December – once again – the percentage of Poles who negatively assess Donald Tusk's government and the Prime Minister himself increased, according to a poll conducted by CBOS.

title: Serious fire and emergency services operation in Skała. "Criminal incident"
description: As a result of a fire that occurred in the town of Skała in the Lower Silesian Voivodeship, one person died and one injured person was taken to hospital. Unofficial reports also indicate that the man who is associated with the case allegedly took his own life.

title: Big weather change on New Year's Day. The forecast for January 2nd is particularly worrying
description: The weather at the turn of 2024 and 2025 will be dynamic. Precipitation, cooling, and strong winds, even gales, are to be expected. In the case of the latter, the most worrying weather forecasts are for Thursday, January 2.

title: He tried to ride a bike up Śnieżka. "Extreme irresponsibility"
description: A man tried to ride a bike up Śnieżka – the highest peak in the Karkonosze and Sudetes. The authorities of the Karkonosze National Park emphasize that this is extremely irresponsible behavior.

title: Minister Izabela Leszczyna on Sylwester Marciniak: The head of the National Electoral Commission is a party activist, not a judge

For me, what the head of the National Electoral Commission, Sylwester Marciniak, is doing is completely incomprehensible - says PO deputy chairwoman Izabela Leszczyna in an interview with Polsat News.

title: Michał Dworczyk comments on the Marcin Romanowski case. He speaks of "surprise" but also "understanding"

title: Cardinal Stanisław Dziwisz to be questioned by the commission on pedophilia

title: Poll: Poles indicate the biggest challenges for Donald Tusk's government in 2025

title: Marek Magierowski: I would advise caution to PiS MPs chanting Donald Trump's name in the Sejm

title: Marek Magierowski: I declared that I was ready to leave

If the account’s owners listened to Radio Maryja or watched TV Trwam more often, the surprise would be smaller.

title: 2025 will be a year of party elections and reconfiguration
description: Just as the results of internal elections can determine the shape of the political scene in the long term, the presidential elections will also affect individual parties and the position of their leaders.

title: Poll: How do Poles assess Donald Tusk after a year in power?
description: "What assessment would you give Donald Tusk after a year as prime minister?" - we asked the participants of the SW Research survey for rp.pl.

title: Part of a tenement house collapsed in Cieszyn. Rescuers entered the rubble, found a phone
description: A rescue operation is underway after part of a tenement house collapsed in the center of Cieszyn in the Silesian province. 170 firefighters are working on site, and there is also a specialist search group with dogs. After stabilizing the wall, rescuers have already entered the rubble, where they are looking for two people: a woman and a man, who were supposed to be on the first and second floors at the time of the incident. - We estimate that the operations will continue for several more hours - said the Silesian governor Marek Wójcik at a press briefing.

title: Sławomir Nitras wrote to Andrzej Duda. "It is not worth persisting in error"

title: Despite the war, Polish institutions help save monuments in Ukraine
description: Russia's aggression has not stopped the conservation work carried out by Polish institutions in Ukraine. We are restoring monuments in Lviv, Berdichev, and also in Olyka.

title: Freezing precipitation and dense fog - IMWM warns of unfavorable weather

title: Survey: Every tenth Pole has not heard about the Marcin Romanowski case

description: It is not a normal country where the executive power blocks the operation of judicial bodies. And the most important courts in the country - said Zbigniew Ziobro, former Minister of Justice and currently a PiS MP, in an interview with Polsat.

title: Romanowski searched blindly. There was a raid on the monastery, there is a complaint to the court

title: Paweł Kukiz apologized to Patryk Jaki. "I hurt his family"
description: "I ask everyone I have unintentionally hurt for forgiveness, and I forgive those who have hurt me," Paweł Kukiz wrote on social media.

title: Political Michałki Extra: 10 key figures of Polish politics 2024 – from Tusk to Mentzen
description: Who won and who lost the most politically? For whom was it a good year and for whom was it not the best? In a special edition of the podcast "Polityczne Michałki", Michał Szułdrzyński and Michał Kolanko sum up the last 12 months in politics.

title: Fifth candidate for science minister. "He has a good chance, he knows the academic community"

title: Zelensky won't agree to a ceasefire with Russia without it. He says about Putin's plan: it's all in his sick head

We are negotiating with him how we can stop [the war], stop Putin,” Zelensky said during an interview with American blogger Lex Friedman, who asked about a possible meeting with Trump and Russian President Vladimir Putin to sign a peace treaty.

This number significantly exceeded the number of births, which was 214 thousand. In the first half of the year, the highest number of deaths was recorded in the Masovian, Silesian and Greater Poland voivodeships.

The document, signed by over 13,000 people and initiated by the performer and writer Rafał Betlejewski, calls for the introduction of a ban on confession for minors. We asked the well-known preacher, Father Paweł Gużyński, what he thought of the petition? He called it very bluntly.

title: Are you on a diet? Try slimming herbs. These infusions are a natural support for losing unnecessary kilograms. They support digestion

Extra kilograms are not only an aesthetic problem, but above all a factor increasing the risk of many serious diseases, such as type 2 diabetes or serious circulatory system diseases. If you want to fight for your healthy and slim figure, and at the same time avoid the yo-yo effect, try slimming herbs. See which herbal infusions will help burn fat and which are good for digestion.

description: Investigation into bull attack on farm

title: Millionth Fish: Tuna Sold for Huge Amount in Japan

title: Prison guard caught having sex with inmate, now she'll be sent to prison herself
description: A prison guard at London's Wandsworth Prison, Linda De Sousa Abreu, was recorded having sex with an inmate while on duty. The intercourse was recorded by another prisoner using a mobile phone smuggled into the cell. The woman will now go to prison herself - on Monday she was sentenced to 15 months in prison.

title: Meta is ditching verifiers. "We'll catch fewer bad things"
description: As part of a series of changes that will affect the moderation of posts, videos and other online content, Meta will adjust its content review policies on Facebook and Instagram. The company is to get rid of fact-checkers and introduce "social notes" from users, Meta CEO Mark Zuckerberg told CNN. "This means we'll catch fewer bad things, but we'll also reduce the number of posts and accounts of people who are accidentally deleted," Zuckerberg said.

title: Ukrainians "actively destroy Russian potential." They have launched a new offensive

title: He took a five-year-old boy from the train station and was convicted of kidnapping

The boy was in the care of his drunken mother, who was convicted of endangering her son. The court conditionally suspended the execution of the sentence against the woman. The verdict is not final.

title: She spent most of her life in prison because she wanted to protect her brother. The woman was acquitted
description: After 25 years in prison, 47-year-old South Korean citizen Kim Shin Hye was cleared of murdering her father. The woman was found guilty in 2000 and a few months later was sentenced to life imprisonment. However, the court that acquitted her now pointed to the lack of evidence linking the Korean woman to the crime and inconsistencies in her incriminating statements.

title: Nationalist leader embarks on mission to form government. Seeks coalition partners

As reported by the Chancellery of the Prime Minister, the state will provide public support in the years 2025-2030 for the company Polskie Elektrownie Jądrowe. This is what the draft law adopted on Tuesday assumes.

Financial support will be available to local governments, associations and companies with their participation - Deputy Minister of Sport Piotr Borys informed on Tuesday.

title: The patient was visited by paramedics, she had a "gynecological examination". The case is being investigated by the prosecutor's office

Investigators are investigating whether this was justified. The report was filed by the ambulance service management after the patient's intervention.

title: Reaction after fatal hit-and-run of 14-year-old: "The state must act quickly and ruthlessly"
description: The Ministry of Digitization has prepared changes that will allow companies to immediately obtain data from the Central Register of Vehicles and Drivers. The solution is to enable quick verification of employees' driving licenses. The ministry's announcement is the aftermath of a tragic accident in Warsaw's Wola district, where a 14-year-old boy died after being hit by a courier driver who had a court ban on driving.

title: Strong earthquake. The death toll is still rising
description: The death toll from the earthquake that struck Tibet on Tuesday morning is rising. The latest data indicates at least 126 dead and 188 injured. A total of over 500 soldiers have been mobilized for the search and rescue operation.

title: This is necessary "to go beyond existing patterns of brain activity"
description: Brain plasticity is essential for effectively learning social behaviors. Polish researchers have discovered that the prefrontal cortex, a structure also involved in problem-solving, plays a key role in this process. A better understanding of this mechanism may help us understand brain abnormalities in disorders in which the ability to socially adapt is reduced.

title: The Grunwaldzki Bridge is reaching its "expiration date"
description: One of the most important bridges in the center of Krakow is in poor condition. Ultimately, officials plan to completely dismantle it and build a new crossing. However, before this plan is implemented, the bridge is to be renovated. Thanks to this, it will serve Krakow residents for another dozen or so years in its current form.

title: He lost control of his car and hit a tree. He died.

Although the name brings to mind a state institution, it is a private organization. Investigators are checking whether its employees collected animals legally during the intervention and how they spent the money from online collections.

description: The court dismissed the priest's complaint against the search of the parish in Dąbrowa Zielona (Silesian Province) in the investigation concerning Jacek Jaworek. Their Wives, Children, Money."

Nordic walking is an activity for everyone, regardless of age and fitness level, which we can do not only in winter, but at any time of year. description: Canadian Prime Minister Justin Trudeau announced his resignation Monday, saying he was not the “best option” for the Liberal Party in Canada’s upcoming election. Trudeau, who has been in power since 2015, has signaled the possibility of moving the election from fall to spring.

title: They are 70 years old, from an unusual age. "I can see from the young that sometimes they have it too easy"
description: Now I feel the happiest. Finally free, I have no obligations (it's rather my children who support me) and it's a wonderful feeling - says Anna Raszewska, a retired bookbinder. She was born in 1955, who lived 35 years in the Polish People's Republic and the same number in democracy. These are people who experienced poverty, survived martial law and the shock of transformation. How do they assess today's Poland?

title: "Gold watch, Louis Vuitton belt". Former rector of Collegium Humanum shines on the internet
description: The prosecutor says about the Collegium Humanum affair: multi-threaded and still developing. Because when it seems that everything is already known, another plot twist occurs.

title: Divorce at 40 tore them out of stagnation. "I got back the life I never had"
description: First, they live dormant for years. They enter into relationships, work, but as if on automatic. And suddenly, after forty, something changes. There are crises in relationships, at work, in life. There is a need for change. Often, it is only divorce that is the stimulus thanks to which maturity becomes new, exciting and full.

title: Is this still tired or already exhaustion? The line is thin
description: There will be days when you give more than you take. And days when you take more than you give. Look at the long term in terms of maintaining specific relationships. The problem comes when you only give or only take. Observe yourself.

title: Mysterious shots in Pomerania. Someone damaged a Mercedes, police appeal
description: The owner of the car notified the police that a strange incident had occurred on the property in Pępowo, Pomerania. Someone had damaged a stationary Mercedes and a window in the building by pointing a gun at them. The officers found bullets at the scene. They are also appealing to witnesses for help in finding the perpetrator and denying some of the disturbing information that has appeared in the media.

title: Marcin Kierwiński in the program "Gość Wydarzeń". Broadcast from 19:15
description: In Tuesday's edition of Gość Wydarzenia, Bogdan Rymanowski will talk to Marcin Kierwiński, Minister for Flood Reconstruction and Secretary General of PO. Broadcast on polsatnews.pl, Interia, Polsat, Polsat News and Wydarzenia 24 from 7:15 p.m.

title: He hit a 13-year-old girl on a crosswalk and fled. Police from Milicz are looking for the driver
description: A teenager was hit on a pedestrian crossing in Milicz (Lower Silesia Province). The perpetrator - an older man in a dark car - did not help her and drove away. The incident was recorded by surveillance cameras, and the police are looking for the perpetrator. The officers are appealing for help in catching him. This is another similar case recently on Polish roads.

title: Ukrainian military bitter about F-16. He wants better fighters
description: The Ukrainian Air Force spokesman reported the feat of an F-16 pilot who managed to shoot down six missiles, including two using an on-board gun. He added, however, that Kiev needs better aircraft. He expressed bitterness about the radars and combat equipment for fighters that Ukraine has received from its allies.

title: A cold wave will hit Poland again. Temperatures will drop immediately
description: The year 2025 welcomed Poland with an intense attack of winter. The services constantly warned of icy roads and sidewalks, heavy snowfall, gales, and frost. In some regions, at the coldest moments, thermometers showed a dozen degrees below zero. What will the situation look like in the coming weeks?

title: A block of ice broke through a car window. A passenger was seriously injured, and they are looking for the perpetrator.
description: A dangerous incident occurred in Mazovia. A block of ice fell from a moving truck, broke the window of another car and seriously injured the passenger - reported the Garwolin police. The driver of the truck most likely did not even notice the incident. Now the police are looking for him.

title: 14-year-old fatally hit. Government responds, there will be urgent changes
description: - In the coming days, until the end of January, automated access to the CEPiK database will be available for entrepreneurs - announced Deputy Prime Minister, Minister of Digital Affairs Krzysztof Gawkowski. This is the government's response to the tragedy that occurred in Warsaw - there, a driver with a driving ban, working for a courier company, fatally hit a 14-year-old boy.

title: She wanted to transport an unusual animal on a PKP train. "Such a big dog"
description: Passengers on PKP trains may encounter an unusual passenger. Social media has been full of videos documenting the journeys of a ram named Rysiek. Recently, however, the animal was not allowed on board a train from Warsaw to Berlin, which sparked a wave of comments. However, the regulations clearly specify which animals and how they can travel on long-distance trains.

title: Weather Armageddon in Norway: Flights Cancelled, Schools Closed
description: Norway is drowning in snow. Forecasters are predicting snowfall of up to 50 cm. The difficult situation has brought planes, ferries and buses to a halt. It has also affected the functioning of companies and schools in parts of the country where distance learning has been ordered. Forecasters are warning that the weather may only get worse.

title: Damage to cables in the Baltic Sea. New information from the Swedish Navy
description: The anchor of the tanker Eagle S, suspected of damaging undersea cables in the Baltic Sea, has been located at the bottom of the Gulf of Finland and brought to the surface, Finnish radio Yle reported on Tuesday.

title: Jean-Marie Le Pen is dead. The founder of the Popular Front was 96 years old
description: French politician Jean-Marie Le Pen has died at the age of 96. He was the founder of the National Front, a multiple MP and a member of the European Parliament. He ran for president five times. He is the father of French politician Marine Le Pen.

title: Another Accident Involving a Prohibited Driver, 18-Year-Old Fights for Her Life
description: Serious accident in Grodzisk Mazowiecki. A driver of a passenger car hit an 18-year-old crossing a pedestrian crossing. She was taken to hospital in serious condition, doctors are fighting for her life. The driver had a court ban on driving. This is another such accident in recent days.

title: Evacuation of high school in Tarnów. Pepper spray was used in classroom
description: Pepper spray was used in a high school classroom in Tarnów. Thirty people had to be evacuated. According to the fire department, three people needed the care of a school nurse, while two were taken to hospital for further consultations.

title: North Korea boasts about successful test of new missile. 'It will scare away any rival'
description: - The hypersonic missile system will reliably deter any rival in the Pacific region, Kim Jong Un said, announcing the successful launch of the new ballistic missile. According to him, the missile flew about 1,500 kilometers at a speed 12 times faster than the speed of sound. The dictator wants to make the new weapon a pillar of strategic deterrence.

title: Tragic accident on track. Seven-year-old dies
description: Sad news from Holland. Seven-year-old Sid Veijer has died after a serious accident two weeks ago while training on a go-kart track. The boy was considered a great talent in motorsport.

title: The Word of the Year 2024 has been announced. It is related to Tusk's government
description: The Coalition is the Word of the Year 2024 according to a poll organized by the Institute of Polish Language at the University of Warsaw. Internet users, on the other hand, opted for artificial intelligence. Students took an even different approach, choosing their own word of the year for the first time.

title: What to do with the tree after the holidays? Don't throw it there under any circumstances
description: A beautifully decorated Christmas tree is a traditional decoration in many Polish homes during Christmas. It is decorated in different ways, depending on preferences. Christmas Eve is the time when, according to tradition, the tree should be decorated, although in some homes it has been up since the beginning of December. It is most often taken down after the feast of the Three Kings.

title: He fatally hit a 14-year-old boy. There is a decision on the arrest
description: The District Court of Warsaw - Wola in Warsaw accepted the motion of the Prosecutor and applied a preventive measure in the form of temporary arrest for a period of 3 months to the perpetrator of the fatal accident of January 3, 2025 - Andrzej K. - informed the District Prosecutor in Warsaw. This concerns the accident in which a 14-year-old boy died.

title: Do you have a license plate like this? You can pay up to 500 PLN fine
description: Regular car inspections, engine oil checks and brake pad replacements are just some of the responsibilities of a car owner. Meanwhile, more and more tickets issued by the police concern improper use of license plates. Every vehicle on Polish roads must have plates that meet certain requirements, and ignoring them can cost you dearly.

title: When will the presidential elections take place? Szymon Hołownia has ruled out one date
description: Szymon Hołownia announced that on Wednesday, January 8, he will announce the decision regarding the date of the presidential elections. The Speaker of the Sejm immediately ruled out one of the possible dates. In his opinion, organizing the vote on this date would be completely absurd and against democracy.

title: It's dangerous in the mountains. It's hard to reach Morskie Oko
description: Icy trails, cracking lake surfaces, strong winds and trees breaking - hiking in the mountains is a mortal danger for tourists. TPN appealed for common sense. Reaching Morskie Oko will be a challenge.

title: They Belonged to the King of Poland. Secret Vault Opened
description: An extraordinary discovery has been made in the basement of the Vilnius Cathedral in Lithuania. Researchers have found a secret hiding place where the regalia of the Polish royal family were hidden after the outbreak of World War II. Among them is a crown made for Alexander Jagiellon.

title: Christmas carols without holy water? Few people know how to behave then
description: The first pastoral visits, commonly known as chodzić po kolędzie, will begin soon. This custom originates from the Middle Ages, when priests began visiting the homes of the faithful during Christmas. In the 15th and 16th centuries, the carol had an additional purpose: it was used to combat superstitious practices and confiscate books that the Church considered heretical.

title: Big changes: You'll have to pay to enter the UK
description: From Wednesday 8 December, citizens of 48 countries, including the US, Canada and Australia, travelling to the UK must obtain an Electronic Travel Authorisation (ETA) before arriving in the country. The cost of this document is £10. From 2 April, this requirement will also apply to Poles.

title: Explosion in a block in Orzysz. 18 people evacuated
description: There was an explosion in a multi-family house in Orzysz, possibly gas. The owner of the apartment said that something exploded in his apartment in the morning, which caused a fire. The man was taken to hospital, and the other residents of the block evacuated. Firefighters also had to help a mother and child who were stuck on the balcony. Firefighting operations are still underway at the scene.

title: They got poisoned by Christmas cake. "She wanted to get rid of her mother-in-law"
description: Brazilian police have detained a 42-year-old woman suspected of poisoning a Christmas cake with arsenic. According to investigators, the woman planned to kill her mother-in-law by doing so. Five family members fell ill after eating the cake. Three of them died.

title: A whip for drivers driving under a driving ban. Deputy minister on the details
description: The government wants to tighten the regulations on drivers who break court bans on driving. - We have a certain systemic problem with this category of drivers - admitted Deputy Minister of Justice Arkadiusz Myrcha on Polsat News. He also presented details of changes to the law that are to increase safety on Polish roads.

title: Bus fell into ditch. There are injured people
description: Near the town of Krupe near Krasnystaw (Lublin Province), a coach went off the road and into a ditch where a car was. Three people were taken to hospital. The police warn that the road is blocked in this place and detours are in place.

title: Powerful earthquake in Tibet. Death toll rises
description: At least 126 people died and 188 were injured in a 6.8-magnitude earthquake in Tibet on Tuesday. Many people are still trapped in the rubble, the Chinese news agency Xinhua reported. Earlier, it had reported 95 dead and 130 injured.

title: Lotto Draw Results. Check Winning Numbers
description: On Monday, January 6, 2025, the draws for the number games run by Totalizator Sportowy took place. Which numbers turned out to be lucky? Here are the results of the draw: Ekstra Pensja, Ekstra Premia, Kaskada, Mini Lotto, Multi Multi.

title: Congress has confirmed Donald Trump's election. Kamala Harris announced it
description: Congress has approved the election of Donald Trump as the 47th president of the United States. The decision was announced by Kamala Harris and was the last formal step before Trump was sworn in, and thus assumed the most important office in the United States. As Reuters pointed out, the approval of electoral votes took place like clockwork, which is different from four years ago.

title: A Visit Shadowed by Controversy: Donald Trump Jr. to Visit Greenland
description: Donald Trump's eldest son plans to visit Greenland, the Danish Foreign Ministry said Monday. Donald Trump Jr. is set to visit the world's largest island just two weeks after his father suggested he wanted to annex it. However, there are no plans to meet with Greenlandic officials, the report said.

title: Krzysztof Sońta is dead. The former PiS MP was 56 years old
description: Krzysztof Sońta, a former PiS MP, former councilor from Radom and long-time director of a local special school, has died. He was 56 years old, and his death was announced by the mayor of Radom, Radosław Witkowski. I will always remember Krzysztof's great commitment and determination - he wrote.

title: Donald Tusk to answer for lack of money for PiS? Prof. Piotrowski: Pregnant threat
description: - The Minister of Finance should comply with the requirements of the Electoral Code and pay out the money to PiS - said Prof. Ryszard Piotrowski in Gość Wydarzeń. The constitutionalist pointed out that if the funds are not paid out, Andrzej Domański will have to answer for his actions. He also pointed out that such a threat also weighs on Prime Minister Donald Tusk.

title: One year left until war escalates? Estonian MFA chief: It's about world order
description: - I appeal to allies to understand that any kind of ceasefire is not peace - said the Estonian Minister of Foreign Affairs, commenting on the situation in the war in Ukraine. He added that the current times are reminiscent of 1938 - the last year before the outbreak of World War II. - It is not just about Europe, it is about the world order - he said, fearing an escalation of the current conflict.

title: Winter paralyzes the United States. There are victims, many people without power
description: A powerful snowstorm has hit seven US states, where a state of emergency has been declared. All this is accompanied by freezing rain and frost, the likes of which America has not seen in over a decade. Up to 300,000 customers have been cut off from power, and warnings are being issued in other regions of the country. So far, the services have reported three deaths from the winter attack.

title: He drove his car into a cemetery, destroyed tombstones. A breakthrough in the search for the driver
description: The services that were called to the cemetery in Nowy Dwór Mazowiecki at night found an unusual sight: a rammed fence, damaged tombstones and an abandoned car, the wheels of which were still turning. The police began searching for the driver, but he - after less than a day - turned himself in to the police station. The 41-year-old was unable to explain how the cemetery was destroyed.

title: Prof. Dudek responds to Kaczyński. "Let them print it"
description: - If you want to know my biography, I recommend Wikipedia, everything is true there. And so is President Kaczyński, let them print it - this is how Prof. Antoni Dudek responded to the words of Jarosław Kaczyński. The PiS leader criticized the political scientist for his strong statement about Karol Nawrocki. As Prof. Dudek mentioned, he counts on the IPN employees to reveal the truth about the situation inside the Institute.

title: He was going to mass, he died in a tragic accident. They say goodbye to the parish priest
description: The 52-year-old parish priest, Fr. Marek Tworek from the Lublin town of Chmielek, has died. According to the police, the man lost control of his car while overtaking and hit an embankment. He enjoyed great respect among the faithful and the local community - local media write about the priest.

title: Ukraine's "counteroffensive" under scrutiny. Expert's bitter conclusion. "Scale too small"
description: - Ukraine is short several hundred thousand soldiers, and Russia is preparing for long clashes, without taking into account losses - said Dr. Łukasz Przybyło. As the expert from the Academy of War Studies added, Kiev has achieved balance in terms of artillery fire, which helps defend against the enemy's offensive. He also pointed out that the actions of the Ukrainians in the Kursk region are not a real counter-offensive.

title: Donald Tusk's Strong Post. Minister Porowska: I Would Call It Differently
description: If PiS does not receive subsidies, will some Poles take to the streets? The Minister for Civil Society stated that another decision by Andrzej Domański will also spark protests. Adriana Porowska in Gość Wydarzeń also referred to the prime minister's post criticizing the right-wing television. "I would call it differently," she said. She also explained why she should be taken seriously.

title: The Big Change in Austria: Pro-Russian Politician on a Mission to Form a Government
description: The leader of the pro-Russian Freedom Party of Austria, Herbert Kickl, has been tasked by President Alexander Van der Bellen with forming a new cabinet. Opponents of the probable future chancellor accuse him of favoring Russia and discriminating against women and migrants. Earlier, Karl Nehammer left the office of head of government.

title: The Pope's surprising decision: He gave an important office to a woman
description: For the first time, a woman has headed a Vatican dicastery. This honor was given to the nun Simona Brambilla by Francis' decision. This is not the end of the changes introduced by the Pope. The Holy See also announced that the Metropolitan of Washington will be a cardinal who is known for his statements critical of the US President-elect Donald Trump.

title: Canadian Prime Minister to Resign, Declaration Made
description: Justin Trudeau will step down as head of the Canadian Liberal Party, and will also resign from the position of prime minister, AFP reported. As the politician declared, this will happen when his successor is elected. In addition, Trudeau announced that the work of parliament will be suspended until the end of March.

title: Russians declare victory. They claim to have captured a key city
description: The Russians announced on Monday that they had taken the Ukrainian city of Kurahove, located near Pokrovsk. This city is strategic from the point of view of operations on the front. According to the occupiers, the defending country suffered heavy losses in the defense of Kurahove. So far, the Ukrainian command has not confirmed the reports from Moscow.

title: Kosiniak-Kamysz in strong words. "There is no room for discussion here"
description: - We will defend hunters, we will defend fishermen, we will defend these traditions - assured Władysław Kosiniak-Kamysz. At a meeting with the residents of Tarnów, the leader of PSL explained not to fall into eco-extremism and assured that without the vote of the PSL no amendment or act has passed in the Sejm. - Our vote counts (...), without us there is no majority - added the deputy prime minister.

title: Starmer responds to Musk: 'Spreading lies and disinformation'
description: "Those who spread lies and disinformation as far and wide as they can are not interested in the victims. They are interested in themselves," Keir Starmer said in response to Elon Musk's accusations. The US billionaire said the British prime minister should be in prison for working for the gangs.

title: He fatally hit a 14-year-old boy. A new move by the prosecutor's office
description: There is a motion for a three-month arrest for the driver who fatally hit a 14-year-old in Warsaw's Wola district, the prosecutor's office announced in the early afternoon. The man - after being submerged, detained and sobered up - heard the charges, to which he admitted. It turned out that this was not the 43-year-old's first conflict with the law.

title: Weather puts a damper on travelers' plans. Flight delays in Gdansk
description: In the morning, difficult conditions prevailed at Gdańsk Lech Wałęsa Airport, which is why the runway of the Tri-City airport was closed, which resulted in delays. - This traffic is now being unloaded, some planes may have delays of one to two hours - spokeswoman Agnieszka Michajłow told Polsat News.

title: Two bodies in apartment. Family was concerned
description: In one of the apartments in Małomice (Lubuskie Province), the bodies of a 27-year-old woman and a 34-year-old man were found. - Family members could not contact them, so the services were alerted. The entrance door was forced open by firefighters - said Deputy Commissioner Arkadiusz Szlachetko from the police in Żagań in an interview with tvn24.pl. It was probably carbon monoxide poisoning.

title: Serious accident near Łowicz. The fault was... a duck
description: The holiday weekend and difficult road conditions are not conducive to travel. This was discovered by a Fiat driver who, in the town of Oszkowice (Bielawy commune), caused a serious accident while trying to avoid an animal sitting on the road. The man was taken to hospital, and a duck was also injured.

title: Recording from the Wrocław Zoo. "We don't know what to have in your head"
description: Two people came to light fireworks right next to the fence of the Wrocław Zoo on New Year's Eve. We don't know what must be in their heads to ignore all our appeals and deliberately expose animals to such enormous stress - the zoo's representatives write on social media.

title: Baltic scenario in Asia. Undersea cable destroyed
description: Taiwan suspects Beijing of severing a key undersea cable off the island's northern coast. Taipei has discovered that a Chinese-owned vessel dropped anchor and damaged a cable carrying data to a U.S. telecommunications network.

title: "I'm not going to give up." Romanowski reveals his plans for the future
description: - I do not intend to resign from my mandate as a member of parliament, I will continue to perform my duties. We are dealing with lawlessness in Poland - said Marcin Romanowski in Graffiti, who has been enjoying political asylum in Hungary for several weeks. The former deputy minister - in response to unfavorable comments from politicians of the ruling majority - called them clowns, with whom there is no point in arguing.

title: Lotto Draw Results. Check Winning Numbers
description: On Sunday, January 5, 2025, the draws for the number games run by Totalizator Sportowy took place. Which numbers turned out to be lucky? Here are the results of the draw: Ekstra Pensja, Ekstra Premia, Kaskada, Mini Lotto, Multi Multi.

title: A chase through the streets of Częstochowa. A 39-year-old tried to avoid a traffic stop
description: A chase through the streets of the city, an abandoned car, a foot escape and a black bag with white powder - this is by no means a trailer for an action movie, but a day in the life of Częstochowa uniformed officers. Officers from the local traffic police detained a 39-year-old who was trying to avoid a traffic check. The man was charged with five offences, and his fate will be decided by the court.

title: Fatal hit-and-run of 14-year-old boy. Suspect pleads guilty
description: The suspect in the fatal hit-and-run of a 14-year-old boy in Warsaw's Wola district has pleaded guilty, Piotr Skiba, spokesman for the District Prosecutor's Office in Warsaw, told Polsat News.

title: Szłapka: Security is important for the presidency. Skiing is important for the president
description: - The president has recognized what is important to him. Safety is important to the Polish presidency. Skiing is important to the president - said Adam Szłapka, speaking about the Polish EU presidency gala. The Minister for European Union indicated the priorities of the Polish presidency of the Community. He also spoke about money for PiS and, as he stated, - Andrzej Domański is not moving.

title: Fire in Falenica Educational Center. Firefighters Use Lifting Equipment
description: Fire in the District Educational Center in the capital city of Falenica. Several dozen firefighters were involved in the extinguishing action. 29 people were evacuated from the facility - junior brigadier Artur Kamiński from the press team of the Municipal Headquarters of the State Fire Service of the capital city of Warsaw told polsatnews.pl. The deputy minister of justice spoke on the matter.

title: Wrongfully Sentenced to 25 Years? New Investigation Launches
description: This could be a breakthrough. There is a chance that Piotr Mikołajczyk, sentenced to 25 years in prison, will be released. According to many experts investigating this case, the helpless and intellectually limited man could not have killed two women in Tłokinia Wielka near Kalisz. A new investigation into the crime has begun. Intervention Material.

title: Tragedy in Podlasie. A man died after being attacked by bulls.
description: A 68-year-old man died in a bull attack in the town of Grochy-Łętownica in Podlasie. A second man was taken to hospital with injuries. Firefighters had to intervene to help secure the animals.

title: She was transporting a child completely drunk. She wanted to escape the police.
description: Częstochowa police arrested a 34-year-old Ukrainian woman who failed to stop for a road check. The woman tried to escape without success. The officers emphasize that she was completely drunk. What's worse, she was transporting a 12-year-old child. The arrested woman has already heard the charges.

title: Most of Poland in alerts. Difficult road conditions
description: IMGW has issued first-degree alerts against freezing precipitation, which may cause black ice that is dangerous for drivers. Warnings are in force in most of the country - except for the north-eastern part of Poland.

title: Arrest for playing field? Couple complains about noise
description: The Orlik pitch in Puławy was forced to limit its operations a few years ago when a couple living next door complained about the noise. The city did everything it could to eliminate the reported inconveniences. Now the mayor of Puławy could end up in jail.

title: Fire in Bydgoszcz. Fire destroyed a warehouse
description: After 1 p.m., a fire broke out in a warehouse at a paper manufacturing plant on Ernsta Petersona Street. Over 100 firefighters fought the fire. A chemical and ecological rescue group intervened on the spot.

title: Drunk driver swerves off road, 17-year-old dies
description: A tragic accident occurred in Roszczyce (Pomeranian Voivodeship). The driver of a Volkswagen veered off the road and hit a tree with force. A 17-year-old female passenger died at the scene, and the man was taken to hospital. There, it turned out that he was drunk.

title: Major disruptions on the railway. There is a PKP announcement
description: On the route Warsaw East - Warsaw Central, there was damage to the traction network - informs PKP PLK. Passengers had to deal with significant difficulties. After 1:00 p.m. the failure was removed.

title: Hit and killed 14-year-old in Wola. Driver arrested
description: A man suspected of fatally hitting a 14-year-old in Wola has been detained, the Warsaw Police Headquarters reported on Sunday morning. At the time of his detention, the 43-year-old was intoxicated, with nearly 2 per mille of alcohol in his system, the release said.

title: He set fire to a multi-family building, six people were taken to hospital. Charges filed
description: At night, he tried to set fire to two residential buildings. Police officers from Starogard Gdański detained the 48-year-old, who has already heard the prosecutor's charges. The man was taken to temporary custody. As a result of his actions, six people were taken to hospital, including three children.

title: Quarrel over the president's absence. "He threw a tantrum and went skiing"
description: - The president is throwing a tantrum and going skiing. This is embarrassing - said Robert Kropiwnicki from PO in the program Śniadanie Rymanowskiego, referring to Andrzej Duda's absence from the inauguration of the Polish presidency of the EU. Radosław Fogiel from PiS accused the head of government of being an internet troll who always tries to pick on someone, referring to their internet post.

title: A drastic change in the weather. The Three Kings will surprise
description: According to the weather forecast of the Institute of Meteorology and Water Management, the Epiphany will be slightly warmer than the weekend. In western Poland, thermometers can measure up to 11 degrees Celsius. We must also prepare for clouds, from which rain will fall in some places in the country.

title: The incredible feat of the Ukrainian F-16 pilot. Americans can be proud
description: The Ukrainian pilot of the multi-role F-16 fighter jet shot down six Russian cruise missiles during a combat mission, said the spokesman for the Ukrainian Air Force, Colonel Yuri Ihnat. The military official noted that this was the first time in history that an American plane had shot down so many missiles in anti-aircraft combat.

title: He hit a 13-year-old girl on a crosswalk and drove away. Police are looking for witnesses
description: The police are looking for witnesses to the hit-and-run of a 13-year-old girl on a pedestrian crossing in Milicz, Lower Silesia. The older man driving the passenger car drove away from the scene.

title: A block of ice fell into a car, seriously injuring a passenger
description: A serious accident occurred on Tuesday in the Masovian town of Słup Pierwszy. A block of ice broke off a truck and smashed the window of a passenger car behind it. The passenger of the car suffered serious injuries and was taken to hospital.

title: New IMGW warnings about icing. It will be dangerous
description: The Institute of Meteorology and Water Management issued a first-degree warning about icing on Tuesday for most of the country, with the exception of some regions in western Poland. The alerts will come into effect on Tuesday evening and will last until Wednesday morning.

title: Brazen robbery of a jeweler in Warsaw. We know the investigators' hypothesis
description: An international criminal group experienced in similar thefts may be behind the audacious robbery of a jewelry store in a shopping mall in Warsaw's Mokotów district. As the RMF FM reporter learned, this is one of the hypotheses adopted by investigators examining the circumstances of the incident that happened over a week ago.

title: Sławomir Mentzen is a guest of the Morning Talk on RMF FM
description: Sławomir Mentzen, co-chairman of the Confederation, leader of New Hope, will be Tomasz Terlikowski's guest on Wednesday in the Morning Talk on RMF FM. We will talk with the candidate for President of the Republic of Poland about, among other things, his proposal for a constitutional reset.

title: 14-year-old boy fatally hit, driver arrested
description: A Warsaw court has imposed a three-month detention on Andrzej K., who is suspected of fatally hitting a 14-year-old. The incident occurred on Friday in the capital's Wola district at a marked pedestrian crossing. After the accident, the driver drove away from the scene.

title: Over PLN 60 billion for the construction of a nuclear power plant. The government has made a decision
description: The Chancellery of the Prime Minister announced in a statement that the government adopted on Tuesday a draft amendment to the act providing PLN 60.2 billion in public support for the Polish Nuclear Power Plants company. This is the investor of the first Polish nuclear power plant.

title: Employers have been given better insight into drivers' qualifications
description: Employers can automatically check whether their employee has not lost their driving license or is not banned from driving. This is the Ministry of Digitization's response to appeals from owners of transport companies after Friday's accident in Warsaw, in which a 14-year-old boy was killed after being hit by a bus driver. How exactly does this system work?

title: Tragedy on the tracks. Train traffic towards Krakow suspended
description: A tragic accident occurred on Tuesday before 12 noon in Rzezawa in the Bochnia district in Lesser Poland. A woman was fatally hit by a train in the area of ​​a railway crossing with a barrier. 200 people are waiting for replacement transport.

title: 15-year-old breaks into and robs currency exchange office. He has been arrested
description: A 15-year-old broke into a currency exchange office in Gubin (Lubuskie Province), from which he stole money and cigarettes for a total amount of PLN 1,400. A few hours later he was detained by the police. The teenager had stolen items and drugs on him.

title: Millions for rebuilding tourist infrastructure destroyed in floods
description: The Ministry of Sport and Tourism will allocate PLN 70 million for the reconstruction of tourist infrastructure in areas destroyed by the flood. Applications may be submitted by local governments, associations and companies with the participation of local governments.

title: Jean-Marie Le Pen is dead. The controversial politician was 96 years old
description: Jean-Marie Le Pen, a French politician and founder of the far-right National Front party (currently operating under the name National Rally), has died at the age of 96. His death was reported by AFP and BFM TV.

title: How many foreigners work in Poland? The Central Statistical Office has provided data
description: 1,041,600 foreigners worked in Poland at the end of July last year - according to data published on Tuesday by the Central Statistical Office. As indicated by the Central Statistical Office statistics, working foreigners came from over 150 countries. Most of them - from Ukraine.

title: Another candidate for president. Razem party will bet on its leader
description: Adrian Zandberg will run in the presidential election - RMF FM journalist Kacper Wróblewski learned unofficially. The members of the Razem Party will make a formal decision on Friday evening. The official presentation of the candidate will take place a day later.

title: "Tagesspiegel": More schools in Brandenburg offer Polish language courses
description: "Tagesspiegel": More schools in Brandenburg offer Polish language courses

description: Polish schools abroad are gaining importance

description: Bilingualism as an important asset of living in a multicultural world

description: Contributions on civil law contracts. Poland-EU negotiations

description: This is how a tourist came down from Kasprowy. "The height of stupidity"

description: The government tightens the visa system. The laws are supposed to "solve the issue"

description: The government responds to tragic accidents. Changes to the law are coming
