description: The highest paid professions. IT is still doing very well

title: Another pedestrian crossing accident. Another driver banned by the court
description: Another pedestrian crossing accident. Another driver banned by the court

title: No bike path in Toruń. No consent to cut down trees
description: No bike path in Toruń. No consent to cut down trees

title: What is the tax-free donation amount in 2025?
description: What is the tax-free donation amount in 2025?

title: Funeral allowance in a new way. The government is preparing a review
description: Funeral allowance in a new way. The government is preparing a review

title: There will be no "Love" in the new year. Another clash between the Presidential Palace and Donald Tusk's government
description: The new year began with more sarcasm between the Presidential Palace and Donald Tusk's government. We are talking about the opening of the Polish presidency of the European Union. From unofficial talks with Andrzej Duda's associates, it appears that it will be similar in the coming months. - In some cases, it will be "slashed" - they say.

title: Does He Really Want to Join Canada and Buy Greenland? Expert Explains Trump's Move
description: Brutal and in Trumpian style, but this is preparing the ground for future negotiations - this is how Americanist Andrzej Kohut comments on a series of statements by Donald Trump. The politician has not yet taken office as president, and has already managed to offend or worry politicians in Canada, Panama and, above all, Greenland.

title: WOŚP responds to PiS. Specific amounts for flood victims announced
description: The WOŚP Foundation spent over PLN 39 million to help flood victims, of which PLN 32 million came from public collection. Details of the expenditure were provided to PiS MPs, who asked Jerzy Owsiak for an explanation.

title: In Austria, the fight for a new government. Herbert Kickl will start negotiations
description: Herbert Kickl, leader of the Freedom Party of Austria, began the mission of forming a new government, commissioned by President Van der Bellen.

title: He didn't keep his promise. Putin humiliated for the second time
description: According to retired British Army Colonel Hamish de Bretton-Gordon, the Ukrainian operation in Kursk Oblast could mean the beginning of the end for Putin. "Ukraine is currently in a much more favorable strategic position than Russia," he writes for "The Telegraph."

title: Will Ukraine cope on its own? Let's not succumb to illusions [OPINION]
description: Until 2013, Ukraine was considered a leader in arms trade. There were years when official revenues from this gave it the fourth place in the world in the ranking of the largest traders. This is how the impression was created about the power of the Ukrainian defense industry, capable of meeting the greatest challenges - writes journalist Marcin Ogdowski.

title: "Can't." Another country an enemy of the billionaire?
description: Spanish government spokeswoman Pilar Alegria emphasizes that social media platforms such as Elon Musk's X should be "completely neutral" and cannot interfere in the internal affairs of countries.

title: Scandal in the emergency room in Wrocław. "Young and pretty". Investigators' movement
description: The prosecutor's office in Wrocław is conducting an investigation into the case of paramedics who performed gynecological examinations on patients during interventions. The report was filed by the ambulance service after a complaint from one of the patients - Onet reports.

title: They are reporting the minister. PiS is filing a specific charge at the prosecutor's office
description: PiS files a report to the prosecutor's office against the Minister of Finance Andrzej Domański. It accuses him of failing to fulfill his duties, i.e. a so-called official crime. This concerns millions of zlotys, the unblocking of which Kaczyński's party is demanding by the adoption by the National Electoral Commission of the PiS financial report from the 2023 parliamentary campaign.

title: Iran Launches Military Drills. Is This a Prelude to an Attack?
description: Iranian armed forces have begun air defense maneuvers near the Natanz nuclear facility. The army and units of the Islamic Revolutionary Guard Corps are taking part in them.

title: They are looking for the driver again. Dramatic footage of a 13-year-old girl
description: Police officers from Milicz are looking for witnesses to the hit-and-run of a 13-year-old girl at a pedestrian crossing. The incident occurred on Tuesday morning on Trzebnicka Street.

title: Government cracks down on road pirates. Radical penalties for violating court ban
description: A lifetime driving ban, car forfeiture and a minimum of PLN 10,000 to pay - these are the penalties for violating a court driving ban in the announced government project. Wirtualna Polska has learned the assumptions of the amendment on road safety, which is to be adopted before the summer holidays. The government is predicting up to five years in prison for organizing or participating in illegal races.

title: A year and there is still a problem. Poland has not managed to cope with the PiS-era scandal
description: Deputy Minister of Foreign Affairs Henryka Mościcka-Dendys notices a decrease in visa pressure on Polish missions. The new laws are to tighten the visa system and adapt it to the needs of the economy.

title: Romanowski has a chance for a breakthrough? He is waiting for a key date
description: The District Court in Warsaw has set a date for a hearing on the complaint against the arrest of former Deputy Minister of Justice Marcin Romanowski. In a month, we will find out what happens next with the PiS MP suspected in the investigation regarding the Justice Fund.

title: Disciplinary action for judge Nawacki. He heard five charges
description: The ad hoc disciplinary spokesman appointed by the Minister of Justice, Judge Andrzej Krasnodębski, presented five disciplinary charges against Judge Maciej Nawacki, a member of the neo-National Council of the Judiciary. They concern, among others, Nawacki's actions against Judge Paweł Juszczyszyn, as well as tearing up the resolution of the Olsztyn judges in his defense.

title: Interia ends cooperation with journalist. He was accused of stealing news
description: Jan Mazurek is no longer a journalist for the Interia portal (Polsat Plus Group). A few days ago, Mazurek's former editorial colleagues from the Weszło service accused him of stealing news - having constant access to his former employer's panel, he allegedly copied content from there and published it in Interia.

title: The publisher of Meczyki has big plans. There will be an app and a new portal
description: Sebastian Felkner, CEO of OV Grupa (formerly Online Venture), presented plans for this year. The company wants to launch the Meczyki.pl application and create a new portal based on the Telepolis service, which it recently acquired.

title: There is a brave person who wants to buy TikTok in the US. Interesting information from overseas
description: TikTok's American assets may be bought by Kevin O'Leary. The sale of the business is a condition for the continued operation of the popular app in the US, set by the Joe Biden administration. TikTok is accused in the US of posing threats to national security and failing to protect user data.

title: Facebook to Become Similar to Platform X. Zuckerberg Announces Changes
description: Meta CEO Mark Zuckerberg announced that the company that owns Facebook, Instagram, and Threads is scrapping its fact-checking program. It will replace it with a system similar to the Community Notes found on Elon Musk's X platform.

title: New TOK FM podcast producer. She comes from "Pismo" magazine
description: Barbara Sowa has joined the editorial team of Radio TOK FM. She has become a publisher and producer of audio content. She will be responsible for the production of podcasts, including podcast series and special productions.

title: Key Polska Press services with a new editor-in-chief
description: Marek Majewski has taken over as editor-in-chief of the "Nasze Miasto" websites and titles, owned by Polska Press Grupa. This brand includes 500 websites with an urban character. The position had been vacant since April of last year.

title: Wiemy, kiedy wraca serial „The Last of Us”. Mamy zwiastun
description: The streaming service Max informed its users that the premiere of the second season of "The Last of Us" will take place sooner than expected, because in the spring. At the same time, the platform released a trailer for the series, from which it appears that we will meet the main characters five years later.

title: Poland’s Tough Media Subscription Market: “Too Much Free Content”
description: In Poland, the digital media subscription market is developing, but publishers face new challenges. - This market is still very deep, many subscriptions can be sold - assesses Tadeusz Chełstowski from Patronite. - Many titles are approaching saturation of their fan base, who have the longest history with a given brand - points out Danuta Breguła from RASP.

title: Republika broke the bank in 2024. TVP1 and TVN remained the market leaders
description: The most popular TV station in 2024 was TVP1. Republika recorded a huge increase in its audience, taking over some of TVP Info's viewers, as a result of which the channel recorded a large decline. TVN continued to lead in the group of slightly younger viewers. Among the four largest stations, TVP2 lost the most.

title: Change at the helm of Radio 357. Transfer from Wirtualnemedia.pl
description: The new head of the Internet Radio 357 is Ewa Świstuniuk, previously associated with Wirtualnemedia.pl and Grupa Infor. She will replace Paweł Sołtys at the head of the station.

title: Regional radio stations received further transfers from the government
description: Regional stations of Polish Radio received further transfers from the Ministry of Culture in December. Marcin Pulit, liquidator of Radio Kraków, informs Wirtualnemedia.pl that in the case of his station it was PLN 1.917 million.

title: Another state giant plays with WOŚP. Contract for several years
description: The insurance company PZU has signed a contract with the Great Orchestra of Christmas Charity for the years 2025-2027. The first step in the three-year cooperation will be the 33rd Finale of the Great Orchestra of Christmas Charity, which will take place in January.

title: Radio Wielkopolska tests AI services. "Speech synthesizers do not replace journalists"
description: Radio Wielkopolska is experimenting with local news services hosted by an AI presenter. The station's owner, Leszek Kozioł, does not want to talk about the details of the tests, but in an interview with Wirtualnemedia.pl he assures that artificial intelligence can improve the work of journalists and improve the sound of the station.

title: Transfers from Onet and TVN to "Question for Breakfast"
description: More people are joining the editorial team of the program "Pytanie na Śniadanie". At the beginning of 2025, the TVP2 breakfast show team was strengthened by Piotr Różycki, who took over as deputy editorial manager, and Agnieszka Mrożek, who became the program's publisher.

title: TV Republika with services for radio stations. "Interest is very high"
description: Telewizja Republika has begun offering audio news services to local radio stations. - We want to fill a gap in the market. The interest is very high - the station's director Tomasz Sakiewicz tells Wirtualnemdia.pl.

title: AI Bots Won't Flood Facebook. Meta Changes Its Mind
description: Meta planned to introduce thousands of accounts run by a generative AI tool to Facebook and Instagram that would be treated the same as human accounts, but the idea sparked so much controversy that the company decided to withdraw it.

title: Advertisement with singing monk unethical. "Lack of justification for religious thread"
description: The Advertising Ethics Commission received a complaint about an advertisement for the product Sanohepatic (Natur Produkt Zdrovit), whose protagonist is a monk. In the opinion of the KER, the advertisement violates the Code of Advertising Ethics.

title: TV Trwam broadcaster demands correction from TVP
description: The Lux Veritatis Foundation, which is, among other things, the broadcaster of TV Trwam, is demanding a correction from Telewizja Polska for the report "Rydzyk's Masterpiece", broadcast on TVP1 on December 13 in the program "Special Report". A complaint about the material was also filed with the National Broadcasting Council by the Team Supporting Radio Maryja in the Service of God, the Church, the Homeland and the Polish Nation.

title: 14 million parcels in one day. InPost grew by one fifth
description: In 2024, the InPost group delivered 1.09 billion parcels, and on a record day during the December shopping peak - almost 14 million. The network of parcel lockers increased by one third, of which by 61% abroad.

title: Changes at MWE Networks. New director of acquisitions and programming
description: Krzysztof Górski joined the MWE Networks Group in January as the Director of Acquisitions and Program Management.

title: Golden Globes revive after image crisis. Record viewership for gala
description: This year's Golden Globe Awards ceremony drew a record audience. The awards show has not been as successful in five years as it was in 2025. The event, broadcast on CBS, drew 10.1 million viewers.

title: Two right-wing weeklies are getting more expensive
description: At the beginning of January, the copy prices of the weeklies "Sieci" (Fratria) and "Do Rzeczy" (PMPG Polskie Media) were increased by 1 zloty.

title: Audi in Poland with a new PR chief. Until now, he worked for Porsche
description: Hubert Niedzielski has taken on the position of PR Manager for the Audi brand in Poland (Volkswagen Group Polska). He will be responsible for media relations, information policy and implementation of the brand's PR strategy.

title: Another nod to Trump? MMA federation chief on Meta Platforms board
description: Three new executives have been appointed to the board of directors of Meta Platforms, including UFC mixed martial arts boss Dana White, a friend and supporter of Donald Trump.

title: The dismissed journalist returns to Channel One. She co-hosts the "Book Club"
description: The "Book Club" show debuted on Radio Jedynka. It is hosted by the station's journalist Magda Mikołajczuk, Aleksander Hudzik from the "Mint" magazine and Agata Kasprolewicz, who was fired from Jedynka five years ago.

title: Solski Communications merges departments and gives promotions
description: At the beginning of the new year, two departments were merged at the PR agency Solski Communications, and the following people were promoted: Joanna Dunin-Kęplicz, Natalia Chyba and Karol Kałuża.

title: Łódź City Hall without a spokesperson
description: The Łódź City Office has lost its press spokesman, Paweł Śpiechowicz. There will be no successor.

title: Broadcaster RMF FM has hired a female HR director
description: A new position of HR director was created in the RMF Group (Bauer Group), taken over by Katarzyna Macek.

title: Orlen sponsors basketball club
description: The Orlen fuel concern has become the title sponsor of the Orlen Zastal Zielona Góra basketball club. The agreement will be valid until the end of the 2024/2025 season.

title: Meta promotes Republican Party manager ahead of Trump inauguration
description: Just days before Donald Trump officially takes office, Meta Platforms is replacing its global operations director. Joel Kaplan, a Republican Party stalwart, will replace Nick Clegg.

title: Former Netflix CMO to Lead Hugo Boss Marketing
description: Former Netflix and IKEA Retail marketing chief James Foster has been appointed global head of marketing at Hugo Boss, tasked with driving a customer-centric approach for the fashion brand.

title: The Ministry of Culture is looking for an agency to handle social media
description: The Ministry of Culture and National Heritage wants to hire an agency that will handle social media services - according to Wirtualnemedia.pl. The budget is almost PLN 740 thousand net.

title: Promotional gadgets – when are they the best choice for your company?
description: Promotional gadgets contribute to building a company's image, and at the same time distinguish the brand from the competition. Thanks to them, we can build a bond with the customer and make our brand positively associated with them. Small gifts, given without a special occasion, bring a smile and are always welcome. The person receiving them feels special and important at that moment, which of course translates into the way they perceive the company. Promotional tools of this type can be given not only to potential customers, but also to contractors and employees. They are useful for many occasions, effectively promoting the company. When are they the best choice? What companies should use them? We invite you to read.

title: Journalists show solidarity with the former editor-in-chief of “Pismo” after the article about her in “Press”. “Violent revenge”
description: An open letter has appeared on the internet concerning a text by Mariusz Kowalczyk in "Press" that has caused a great stir in the journalistic community, in which he negatively described the former editor-in-chief of "Pismo" Magdalena Kicińska. "It is impossible to read the publication "Była naczelna" in any other way than as violent revenge, and in human terms - plain meanness," we read in the letter.

title: Jerzy Owsiak responds to the action of Republika. "If you don't play, don't interfere"
description: You play, big thanks and respect. You don't play, don't interfere - appealed on Monday Jerzy Owsiak, president of the Great Orchestra of Christmas Charity Foundation. For several days now, Telewizja Republika has been encouraging people to support the collection instead of donating to WOŚP.

title: Republika vs. wPolsce24. "The winner takes it all, the second fights for life"
description: A year after the changes in TVP, Republika has several times higher viewership than wPolsce24. - We simply know how to make television. They know how to do it worse, since they have fewer viewers - Jarosław Olechowski, head of Republika's publishers, tells Wirtualnemedia.pl. - I can answer our competitors like this: They predicted that we would fail. They were wrong. We are firmly on our feet. Now they say that we will not catch up with them. They can also be wrong - replies Michał Adamczyk, program director of wPolsce24.

title: Will AI take away PR people's jobs?
description: Will public relations experts be sidelined, replaced by artificial intelligence tools? Not so fast – argues Katarzyna Dworzyńska, CEO and founder of PR Calling, in a column for Wirtualnemedia.pl.

title: Tragedy on the road in Warsaw. InPost's CEO appeals to the authorities
description: On Friday in Warsaw, a man working for a courier company fatally hit a 14-year-old boy and fled the scene of the accident. It turned out that he had multiple criminal records, an active driving ban, and his driving license was confiscated in 2023. InPost CEO Rafał Brzoska assured that the perpetrator did not work for the company. He appealed to the government to allow employers to verify employees' driving licenses.

title: 10 TV Shows Worth Waiting For in 2025
description: In 2025, there will be premieres of series that are expected and important for Polish viewers, such as Netflix's "Heweliusz", which will tell the story of the Polish ferry disaster, or the spy thriller "Przesmyk" created for the Max service. There will also be returns of popular hits, such as "Biały Lotos" or "Stranger Things".

title: Agora spends more on salaries. Despite layoffs at “Gazeta Wyborcza” and Gazeta.pl
description: Despite the reduction in employment, the Agora group incurred employee costs 6% higher than a year ago in the third quarter of 2024. The largest increase in this area was observed in Helios cinemas.

title: Streaming giant takes over pay-TV platform
description: Streaming platform DAZN acquires Australian operator Foxtel, which offers both TV channels and streaming content, in a first for DAZN.

title: On TVP Info Kępno instead of London. The broadcaster explains the mistake
description: Recently, TVP Info reported that journalist Artur Kieruzal was broadcasting from London, while he was in his hometown of Kępno. TVP explains that there was a mistake.

title: Golden Globes handed out: "Emilia Perez" and "The Brutalist" best films, Demi Moore best actress
description: The French crime musical Emilia Perez, directed by Jacques Audiard, won the Golden Globe for Best Foreign Language Film, the best drama film was Brady Corbet's The Brutalist, which won the award for Best Director, and Demi Moore was the best actress. Jesse Eisenberg's True Pain, directed by Polish filmmakers, received a statuette for his supporting actor performance as Kieran Culkin.

title: When Will 'Squid Game' Season 3 Debut? There's a Probable Date
description: So far, Netflix has only announced that the third season of “Squid Game” will premiere in 2025, but series creator Hwang Dong-hyuk went a step further and suggested in an interview with Variety that it will be summer or fall. However, the speculation doesn’t end there.

title: Italian government to buy services from Elon Musk? Negotiations start after Trump visit
description: Italy is in advanced talks with Elon Musk's SpaceX over a contract to provide secure telecommunications services to the government, Bloomberg reported on Sunday, citing sources familiar with the matter.

title: The actor from "1670" advertises ING Bank Śląski
description: The new advertising campaign for cego features actor Michał Sikorski, best known for his role in the Netflix series "1670". The campaign advertises a savings account with promotional interest.

title: Tomasz Terlikowski debuts on RMF FM in the morning. "I don't want to be the new Robert Mazurek"
description: On Tuesday, January 7, Tomasz Terlikowski takes over the helm of "Poranna Rozmowa" on RMF FM. The journalist's first guest will be a politician from the ruling coalition, running in the presidential elections - the portal Wirtualnemedia.pl has learned. - I don't want to be the new Robert Mazurek, because I am myself - Terlikowski announces in an interview with Wirtualnemedia.pl.

title: Here are the best Polish series of 2024. There was a lot to watch
description: 2024 was a good year for Polish series. Each platform offered at least one strong title for its audience. Netflix dominated the Polish series map with both new releases, such as "Idź przedem, bratie" and the successful return of "Gang Zielona Glowiczki". Canal+ surprised with new formats - just mention "Karzy ślub?" and "Prosta Sprawa". In turn, Max surprised in December with the premiere of the brilliant "Lady Love", and SkyShowtime with "Ślebodą".

title: On credit from Allegro. Then the purchases are one third bigger
description: Allegro Pay, a service in which Allegro provides loans to users for purchases on the platform, continues to grow rapidly. The company also plans to provide loans to customers for purchases in other stores.

title: "Reindeer" was a hit in 2024. Psychologist answers important questions about the series
description: The series "Reindeer" turned out to be one of the most important productions of 2024. The story of the Scottish comedian took on a life of its own after the end credits. The media wondered whether the creator, Richard Gadd, had crossed the line by not protecting the identities of the people he was inspired by when writing the script. And also whether it was a groundbreaking production showing male trauma experienced in silence. People asked whether the series' Martha was humiliated. We talked about all this with psychologist Katarzyna Kucewicz.

title: GUS: the ambulance service is too slow, although the number of ambulances is increasing and there are fewer trips
description: Although we have more ambulances and there are significantly fewer trips to the sick and accident victims, it still takes the ambulance service longer to arrive at the scene of the accident than the regulations allow.

title: PiS denounces Domański in subsidy case. Accuses him of official misconduct
description: Failure to fulfill duties, i.e. the so-called official crime - this is the accusation made by PiS against the Minister of Finance. It concerns millions of zlotys, the unblocking of which Kaczyński's party is demanding for the adoption by the National Electoral Commission of the PiS financial report from the 2023 parliamentary campaign.

title: Unofficially: Adrian Zandberg is Razem's candidate for president of Poland
description: According to "Wyborcza", the Razem party will make a decision on the candidate this weekend. Unofficially, it is known that it will be Adrian Zandberg.

title: Strong earthquake in Tibet and PiS's plan for the state budget [SUMMARY OF THE DAILY EVENTS]
description: We publish hundreds of texts every day, our site changes very dynamically. Here we collect the most important news of the day.

title: Razem Party attacks the ruling coalition. It shows "100 failures of the Tusk government"
description: Razem has prepared an information campaign and a list of 100 government failures over the past year. It argues: - We show irregularities, scandals, cases that have not been delivered.

title: Problems of "old-fashioned" PhD students. The Human Rights Ombudsman intervenes in the matter of unequal treatment
description: "There is unequal treatment of doctoral students, because some are exempt from fees and others are not," says the Commissioner for Human Rights and appeals for a change in the regulations.

title: Mileage in the State Forests: Former spokesman halfway to the moon
description: There have been legends about how many kilometers the Ziobro politician from Tolkmicko drove in his company car. The State Forests have finally answered our questions about Michał Gzowski's travels.

title: What awaits the new Minister of Science? List of unfinished business left after Wieczorek
description: Science is waiting for another new beginning. And a list of started and unfinished business awaits the new head or head of the ministry.

title: EU Presidency Inauguration Without Duda. Why Did He Choose to Absent?
description: The president's absence at Friday's gala inaugurating the Polish presidency of the European Union is a sign that instead of the interests of Poland, he is focusing on the interests of PiS.

title: Kaczyński's third refrigerator. He wants to take over the Presidential Palace with it
description: PiS wants to take a fridge to the Presidential Palace by storm. This is the third campaign in which it has used this motif. - Close those fridges already - appeals the creator of the first advert from years ago.

title: Tusk on Nawrocki at farmers' protest: Do you want a president who will destroy Europe with Putin?
description: In his post on X, the Prime Minister pointed out that while other presidential candidates participated in the inauguration of the Polish presidency of the EU, PiS candidate Karol Nawrocki took part in a farmers' protest, where they demanded, among other things, Polexit.

title: Braun may run in the elections. Confederation fears he will thwart their plans
description: The Konfederacja candidate in the presidential election is Sławomir Mentzen, who is already running a pre-campaign. But another Konfederacja politician, Grzegorz Braun, is also considering running.

title: The bill is to hit Romanowski's pocket retroactively. Criminalist: It's populism
description: The act, the draft of which was submitted to the Sejm by the coalition, is to deprive MP Marcin Romanowski of his salary retroactively. - Such retroactive operation of the law is not permissible in a democratic state - says Dr. Szymon Tarapata, a criminal law expert from the Jagiellonian University. - This is an amendment thrown together quickly, without deep reflection, a bit populist - he adds.

title: Tusk at the inauguration of the Polish presidency: You are lucky, Europe
description: - Europe is lucky. Yes, Europe, you are lucky that at this very difficult moment in history, Poland will fulfill the mission of the presidency - said Prime Minister Donald Tusk in Warsaw during the gala inaugurating the six-month Polish presidency of the EU.

title: Supreme Court Lay Judges: Do not take into account the judgments of pseudo-chambers
description: "Changes in the Supreme Court should mean at least the liquidation of two illegal chambers and the removal of all so-called neo-judges without leaving them any privileges" - representatives of the Supreme Court lay judges addressed the government.

title: Post-holiday Energy Boost - PHOTO REPORT
description: We invite you to see the photo report from yesterday's competition.

title: Photo report of the 2nd edition of Skating Thursdays
description: We invite you to see the photo report

title: Post-holiday Energy Boost
description: After the holidays, everyone could use some exercise and energy, so we invite you to the "Post-holiday energy boost" at the Polonia Centre at Konwiktorska 6. The event for basketball fans will take place on December 29 between 11:00 and 16:00, on which day the Polonia Centre will transform into a basketball hall. During the event, an outstanding Polish basketball player will participate in training and attractions. We are not revealing who it will be yet, we are keeping a secret!

title: Holiday opening hours of the centres
description: All active residents and residents of Warsaw will be able to use sports facilities during the Christmas and New Year period. The centers will operate at special hours. Therefore, before visiting your favorite place, we recommend checking the announcements.

title: Get moving, Warsaw, after the holidays
description: Together with the Warsaw City Hall, we encourage Warsaw residents to be physically active! As part of the “Get moving, Warsaw after the holidays” initiative, we provide free sports facilities that will help you take up this challenge. Let’s take care of our health together and strengthen ourselves before the New Year.

description: The conference that begins voting in the Plebiscite for the Best Sportsmen of Warsaw is behind us. As every year, we encourage internet users to take part in the voting in the Plebiscite, the aim of which is and has always been to promote the idea of ​​sports among the residents of Warsaw and to honor the hard work and many sacrifices of Warsaw athletes.

description: The District Court for Warsaw-Wola agreed with the prosecutor's request and decided to apply temporary arrest to Andrzej K., a courier who fatally knocked down a 14-year-old boy in Warsaw's Wola district before the weekend.

description: The decision was not easy.

description: Perry lived to be 30 years old.

title: Police check unusual places. They are looking for people in crisis.
description: Winter is a difficult time for people in the homeless crisis, who have to deal with low temperatures and a lack of shelter. Police officers from Dąbrowa Górnicza are intensifying their activities to help those who need support the most. They also regularly patrol unusual places, offer help and provide information about available shelters.

title: Zawadzka's son has had health problems since birth. Shocking circumstances of delivery
description: Marcelina Zawadzka, known for hosting the "Farma" program, does not shy away from difficult topics. This time, in the program "Halo tu Polsat" she shared what she had to face fighting for the health of her son - Leonidas. The delivery of the boy, who was born in October 2024, was a great challenge for his mother.

title: Why are Barcelona and Real playing for the Super Cup outside Spain?
description: Robert Lewandowski, Wojciech Szczęsny and their teammates from FC Barcelona will start the fight for the Spanish Super Cup on Wednesday. For several years now, the tournament for this trophy has been played in Saudi Arabia. The reason? Money, of course.

title: She was bathing the elephant. Suddenly the animal panicked. It ended tragically.
description: A major tragedy occurred during an elephant bath in a sanctuary in southern Thailand. A 22-year-old Spaniard, Blanca Ojanguren Garcia, died after being fatally wounded by the animal's trunk. Elephant bathing is a major tourist attraction in Thailand. It is not known why the animal panicked and attacked the woman.

title: He withdrew a huge amount of money from an ATM. Police are asking for help in finding him
description: The Warsaw police are intensively searching for a man who withdrew a significant amount of money from an ATM in the Westfield Mokotów shopping center. The incident took place on September 20, 2024. Officers are appealing for help in identifying the perpetrator and are asking anyone who may have information about this crime to contact them.

title: Government wants changes to important benefit, industry raises a fuss
description: The government has unveiled another version of the draft changes to the funeral allowance, enraging the industry. Instead of automatic indexation, the amount of the allowance would be reviewed annually. The changes could only come into effect from 2026, meaning the allowance will remain at its current level for another year. Funeral homes point out that the costs of burials are already so high that people are having to take out loans to bury a loved one.

title: He ran over 14-year-old Maksym on a crosswalk. No remorse. This is how Andrzej K. behaved in court
description: On Tuesday, Andrzej K., suspected of causing a fatal accident and fleeing the scene, was escorted to the District Court for Warsaw-Wola by police officers. The man has already heard the charges, and the court decided to temporarily arrest the suspect for three months. During his visit to court, the man showed no sign of remorse. Immediately after leaving the courtroom, he covered his face and refused to answer questions.

title: A surprising choice for the Word of the Year 2024. You won't guess what the students chose
description: For the fourteenth time, the University of Warsaw organized a competition for the Word of the Year, which has become a kind of linguistic barometer, reflecting the current mood in Poland. The jury announced that the Word of the Year in 2024 was "coalition". The choice of internet users fell on "artificial intelligence". And how did the students choose?

title: A huge flood flooded their pitch. The president's reaction is an internet hit [VIDEO]
description: Unusual scenes after a downpour in Great Britain. After a huge downpour that paralyzed part of the country, the stadium of Anstey Nomads, a team from the eighth league, was transformed into a real lake. However, the club's chairman, Tony Blanchard, decided to use this situation in his own way. His unusual reaction is a real hit on the Internet!

title: Poles Discover Treasure Worth Millions. You Won't Believe Where
description: In 1985, Środa Śląska became the site of a discovery that moved not only Poland but the world. During earthworks, a treasure was discovered there, the value of which was estimated at that time at 75 million dollars, which today is equivalent to over 300 million złoty. The find included gold and silver coins, jewelry, and a magnificent crown set with precious stones.

title: Up to PLN 17,000 for a winter camp. Applications are open
description: The Halina Konopacka LOTTO Foundation announces the "odLOTTOwe ferie 2025" competition, which aims to support the organization of stationary winter camps for young students. As part of the initiative, primary schools from all over Poland will have the opportunity to receive targeted donations that will enable the organization of a rich winter break program.

title: Domański under pressure, PiS does not give up. "We file a notification"
description: Law and Justice files a notice of a possible crime committed by the Minister of Finance, Andrzej Domański. According to the party's spokesman, Rafał Bochenek, it concerns failure to fulfill obligations. This is a reaction to the failure to pay subsidy funds despite the decision of the National Electoral Commission to accept the party's financial report. Another name appeared in the letter.

title: Dino's Earnings. Mysterious Boss Generous to Cashiers?
description: Poles associate Dino with the red logo, villages and towns. However, this chain of supermarkets has an appetite for more - it is also opening new stores in large cities. Dino is looking for employees for discount stores, headquarters and warehouses. How generous is Tomasz Biernacki - the founder of the chain and at the same time the most mysterious businessman in Poland?

title: Patyra has taken a dig at Artur Orzech. It's about late fatherhood. "We prefer to look like a parent to our children, not a grandpa"
description: Antek Królikowski and Artur Orzech were the heroes of one of the discussions held on this morning's TV Republika. At the end of the story about fatherhood, the host of the breakfast show Rafał Patyra gave Orzech a hard time by pointing out his age.

title: She saw an accident in Wola. A moving account. "When I turned around, he was already under the wheels"
description: She doesn't know the family of the 14-year-old. She didn't know him personally. But she saw his last moments. Mrs. Anna [name changed – editor's note] witnessed a tragic accident in Warsaw's Wola district. A teenager died under the wheels of a minibus. "I heard a bang and turned around," she tells us, moved. Our interlocutor has one request.

title: The reconstruction of the Polish Post Museum in Gdańsk will cost PLN 11.4 million
description: The renovation of the Polish Post Museum in Gdańsk will cost PLN 11.4 million. The museum's usable area will be increased, and previously closed cellars will be made available. The new exhibition will feature approximately 3,000 exhibits, the Gdańsk City Museum reported on Tuesday.

title: Rafał Geremek is the new vice-president of the city of Gdynia
description: "Rafał Geremek joined the group of Gdynia local government officials, receiving the nomination for the position of vice-president of Gdynia from President Aleksandra Kosiorek on January 7, 2025" - it was reported in a statement posted on the website of the Gdynia City Hall.

title: NATO is taking ships to the Baltic Sea in response to a series of "accidents" at sea
description: In just a few days, a special NATO operation will begin. New ships will sail to the Baltic Sea.

title: Zuckerberg follows in Musk's footsteps. Big changes at Facebook
description: Mark Zuckerberg announced that the Meta group, which owns the social media platforms Facebook and Instagram, will "drastically reduce censorship."

title: Is Homolobby Pressure Working? Spanish Cardinal Apologizes for Healing Homosexuality
description: The diocese of Barcelona has expressed its disagreement with homosexual conversion therapies, particularly those taking place on its territory.

title: AfD ready for coalition with CDU. Gmyz: Germany looks at Austria
description: The AfD has expressed its readiness to co-govern with the Christian Democrats. For now, the CDU has ruled out such a coalition, but it is not unthinkable, says Cezary Gmyz.

title: "Historic record." Ukrainian F-16 pilot's daring action during Russian shelling
description: A Ukrainian pilot destroyed six Russian missiles in a single flight in an F-16 fighter jet, media reports. That day, Moscow was supposed to have sent over 200 drones towards Ukrainian cities.

title: Storm over the text about the former head of "Pismo". Editor-in-chief of "Press" responds to allegations
description: The editor-in-chief of the bimonthly "Press" Andrzej Skworz responded to an open letter from the journalistic community, which criticized an article about the former head of "Pismo" Magdalena Kicińska. Skworz admitted that the text was "critical", but emphasized that it was not a "lampoon". What else was included in Skworz's statement?

description: European Commission monitors Elon Musk's activities on platform X

title: Announcement of a new function in CEPiK. "There will be no possibility of deceiving the state"
description: Tuesday's special press briefing by Deputy Prime Minister and Minister of Digital Affairs Krzysztof Gawkowski **was convened in connection with the road accident that took place in Warsaw on January 3**. A 14-year-old boy died in the accident, and a few days later information emerged that the driver did not have a driving license. This sparked a heated discussion in the public sphere.

title: Saint Florian's Cross for the late Kazimierz Leszczyński
description: The President of the Republic of Poland, Andrzej Duda, posthumously awarded the Cross of St. Florian to the late Kazimierz Leszczyński, Honorary President of the OSP Michowice, for outstanding achievements in the implementation of tasks resulting from being a member of the volunteer fire brigade.

title: Saint Florian's Cross for the late Kazimierz Leszczyński
description: The President of the Republic of Poland, Andrzej Duda, posthumously awarded the Cross of St. Florian to the late Kazimierz Leszczyński, Honorary President of the OSP Michowice, for outstanding achievements in the implementation of tasks resulting from being a member of the volunteer fire brigade.

title: Hat-trick for demand for the Warsaw Stock Exchange. "The weakness of our stock exchange may be wearing off"
description: In 2025, the main indices on the WSE will only grow, which means that they have already had three growth sessions. In football terms, we would say that this is a hat-trick of demand. The expert does not rule out that the weakness of the Polish parquet in recent months may be coming to an end.

title: The war with Russia has been going on in cyberspace for a long time. Gawkowski: We are the most attacked in the EU
description: There is a war going on in cyberspace today between Russia and Poland. We are the most attacked country in the European Union - said Deputy Prime Minister and Minister of Digitization Krzysztof Gawkowski during a press conference on Tuesday.

title: Is tightening migration policy bringing results? MFA: We see a decrease in visa pressure
description: We see a decrease in visa pressure on Polish diplomatic missions - said Henryka Mościcka-Dendys, deputy head of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs, on Tuesday. She also expressed hope that the draft laws tightening the visa system will eliminate the problem of issuing work permits in excessive numbers.

title: Maximum prices in offshore remain unchanged. Ministry of Climate maintains proposals
description: The Ministry of Climate has again proposed three levels of maximum prices in auctions for Phase II projects of offshore wind farm construction. In the draft of the relevant regulation, the proposed prices are PLN 485.71, 499.33 and 512.32 per MWh net.

title: A boat carrying 63 migrants sank, killing two
description: Two people died when a boat carrying migrants sank off the coast of the Greek island of Rhodes on Tuesday. The 63 foreigners on board were rescued. The coast guard, with the support of volunteers, is searching for more potential survivors.

title: Serious accident in Słup Pierwszy. A block of ice from a truck injured a woman
description: A dangerous incident occurred in Słup Pierwszy (Borowie commune) at around 11:05 a.m. A block of ice broke off the roof of a moving truck and hit an oncoming Volkswagen. The ice broke through the vehicle's windshield and injured the passenger, who was transported to hospital with serious facial injuries. What are the consequences for not clearing snow from the vehicle?

title: Adam Nawałka will once again lead the Polish national team. He has already sent out call-ups
description: Adam Nawałka will return to the coaching bench of the Polish national team. The former coach of our team will lead the white and reds in the exhibition match Poland - Brazil with the participation of football legends of both countries.

title: Warning, glass on the roads! Weather forecast for Wednesday and Thursday
description: What will the weather be like on Wednesday and Thursday, January 8 and 9? Poland will be in the range of a low with a center over southern Scandinavia. Cooler maritime polar air will flow in. Rain and sleet are predicted, locally snow. Black ice is possible.

title: Polish-German cooperation enters a new level. In the background, the fight against illegal migration
description: Since the beginning of 2025, the fourth Polish-German border service cooperation facility has been operating in Tuplice, Lubuskie Province. This joint venture of Polish border guards and German federal police officers aims to strengthen activities in the field of combating international crime and other cross-border threats, such as illegal migration. Information about the opening of the unit was provided by the spokesman of the Nadodrzański Border Guard Unit, Lt. Paweł Biskupik.

title: The sixth anniversary of the death of Paweł Adamowicz. Gdańsk will honor the memory of the tragically deceased president
description: Gdańsk is planning to mark the sixth anniversary of the death of Paweł Adamowicz. The planned events include the unveiling of a commemorative plaque at the European Solidarity Centre, the presentation of the Paweł Adamowicz Award, and an interfaith prayer at St. Mary's Basilica. The celebrations will begin on January 13.

title: At 6:00, your boss will check your driving license. Changes coming in January 2025
description: This will be a new whip for drivers. In January, a system will be launched that will allow employers to automatically check employees' driving licenses every day at 6:00. The Ministry of Digital Affairs announces 100% effectiveness of checks.

title: What was the real cost of Brexit? In trade alone, it is big. There are new calculations
description: Despite the fall in trade, the LSE study found that the overall impact of Brexit on the UK economy was more limited than originally forecast. However, the costs of divorce were still huge and are still being counted

title: Local governments want changes in geological law. It concerns land on coal deposits. "Hard to sell"
description: Owners of land located on brown coal deposits are not allowed to build on them, and municipalities are not allowed to build roads on them, although it is known that this coal is unlikely to be extracted.

title: E-communication with the court. Changes are coming too slowly
description: The Ministry of Justice has presented a draft amendment to the criminal procedure enabling two-way electronic communication during criminal proceedings. According to practitioners, however, the changes are moving too slowly and should also cover civil proceedings.

title: It Wasn't a Technical Error. We Know What Caused the Jeju Air Plane Crash
description: Members of the investigation committee that was supposed to explain the causes of the Jeju Air Boeing 737 crash on December 29, 2024, found bird feathers in the remains of the plane's engine. Initial findings indicate that the cause was a collision with birds.

title: Facebook's Owner's Strong Nod to the Right. Zuckerberg Fawning on Trump?
description: Following the path of platform X, the Meta group also announces that its services such as Facebook and Instagram will reduce the number of content moderators. The media in the US note that this is the result of the change of government and the return of Donald Trump to the office of president.

title: Hołownia: The case with MP Romanowski is clear
description: - The case with MP (Marcin) Romanowski is clear: the MP (…) fled the country, but remains a MP, no one has deprived him of his mandate, nor has he resigned from it. He has decided, and has publicly announced it, that he will not exercise his mandate as a MP in the territory of the Republic of Poland in any way. In connection with the above, we must draw consequences from the decision that the MP has made - said Marshal Szymon Hołownia after the session of the Presidium of the Sejm.

title: Michał Szułdrzyński: The attack on Prof. Malicki is a symbolic attack on Poland's eastern policy
description: If Donald Tusk's government wants to effectively combat the influence of Russia and Belarus on Poland's security, it should give the highest priority to the investigation into the attack on Professor Jan Malicki. Bowing to the courage of the director of the East European Studies at the University of Warsaw, I appeal to the government to clarify this matter.

title: Donald Trump beat Justina Trudeau
description: In the spring, the new prime minister of Canada will almost certainly be Conservative Party leader Pierre Poilievre. Elon Musk has endorsed his candidacy.

title: The government will allocate PLN 60 billion for a nuclear power plant. Now it's time for Brussels
description: The Council of Ministers has adopted a draft amendment to the Act on the preparation and implementation of investments in nuclear power facilities and accompanying investments and the Act on profit payments by single-member companies of the State Treasury. The government has thus decided to allocate PLN 60.2 billion for the project of building the first nuclear power plant in the years 2025-2030. This is the own contribution needed to build the first nuclear power plant in Poland.

title: A Century of Strong Women
description: It is widely believed that it was only in the late 19th century that women began to demand their rights. In fact, they had been doing so for four centuries before, when they had a significant influence on public life in Europe.

title: Owsiak brags about helping flood victims. What did he forget?
description: To date, WOŚP has spent over PLN 39 million to help flood victims, including PLN 32 million from public collections, according to the settlement published by the foundation.

title: Wałęsa "puts his life in order". He claims that he "described his colleagues"
description: "The security service did it cleverly, sent it all over the world, even to the Kaczyńskis, Macierewiczs."

title: The government has adopted projects on nuclear energy and biofuels
description: The draft amendment to the Biofuels Act adopted by the government today envisages increasing the share of energy from renewable sources, including from biofuels in transport to 14.9% in 2030.

title: The "Stop Road Bandits" project is now ready
description: "We will be starting the government process in a few days."

title: Nowacka attacks Czarnek regarding money. She got an answer!
description: "Oh my God! Really? There is no such report yet????!!!!... Wait, wait, is it 2024 or 2025? Isn't it possible that Ms. #Nowacka has been in power at the Ministry of National Education for two years now?" asked Przemysław Czarnek.

title: Orban's Close Associate with US Sanctions
description: High-ranking Hungarian official Antal Rogan has been placed under sanctions on suspicion of involvement in corruption in Hungary, Reuters reported on Tuesday, citing the US Treasury Department.

title: Storms over Poland. Snow is falling and wind is strong
description: Storms appeared over the northern and western parts of the country on Tuesday evening. Light rain, snow and gusty winds accompany the lightning. Check where the storm is and follow the current weather situation on tvnmeteo.pl.

title: Schools closed, security guards and parents being checked for ID: Croatia responds after attack
description: With the start of the new semester, tightened security regulations have come into effect in schools across Croatia. Under these regulations, educational institutions have been required to, among other things, close their doors during lessons and check all visitors. The regulations were introduced in response to the December knife attack.

title: "Queen" and "King" of Wolves. How it is in Poland
description: The loss of an 11-year-old female wolf from the American Yellowstone Park caused a huge stir among scientists. The female, known as 907F, was called the "queen of wolves" due to her dominant role in the family group. Such old specimens are not common in populations of this species. As it turns out, however, cases of "long-lived" wolves are also known in Poland. Prof. Sabina Pierużek-Nowak from the Association for Nature "Wilk" told us about their lives.

title: Emmanuel Macron: There will be no quick and easy solution to the war in Ukraine
description: French President Emmanuel Macron appeals to the Ukrainian authorities to have realistic expectations regarding its territory. Until now, France has stood by the integrity and indivisibility of Ukraine. Now Macron said: "let's have no illusions, there will be no quick and easy solution to the war in Ukraine". The Russians have once again carried out dozens of attacks on Ukrainian towns. In Kherson, a drone they launched hit a city bus.

title: Teenager charged with using fake school ID
description: A 19-year-old from Komorów near Warsaw will be charged with using a fake school ID. The fake document aroused the suspicions of a ticket inspector on public transport, who reported the matter to the police. Using fake documents is punishable by up to five years in prison.

title: Water destroyed the kindergarten. A new one is being built, from containers. "It will be fabulous"
description: A temporary modular kindergarten is being built in Stronie Śląskie (Lower Silesia). It will provide care for 205 children. During the September flood, the old building was destroyed by the elements.

title: She barely had control over the car, the breathalyzer test result was shocking
description: She had over four per mille of alcohol in her system, but she got behind the wheel anyway. The police noticed the 35-year-old because she had trouble controlling the car.

title: He was stuck in a blizzard with an eight-year-old child on the peak, they were hypothermic
description: A man and an eight-year-old child got stuck on Pośrednia Turnia in the Tatras. They were very hypothermic and couldn't get down even with the help of a rescuer. It was necessary to set up a heated tent - informed the TOPR duty rescuer. - We once again appeal to all visitors to the Tatras to adjust their trips to the prevailing conditions and the participants' abilities - he added.

title: Changes in dental services within the National Health Fund in 2025
description: In January 2025, the number of dental services available under the National Health Fund (NFZ) is increasing. This includes, among others, a panoramic X-ray for patients undergoing endodontic and prosthetic treatment, or procedures in the case of dislocated teeth.

title: A wounded she-wolf was lying by the road. She was saved
description: She is resting a lot, but is slowly starting to get better. The condition of the young she-wolf, who was found in a roadside ditch in a town near Morąg at the end of the year, is improving. Is there a chance that she will be released back into the wild?

title: Father took his son to the Tatras. He was found by TOPR, who was hypothermic.
description: It was not an easy operation by the Tatra Volunteer Search and Rescue. A father who went on a trail with his eight-year-old son asked for help. However, the weather conditions were so difficult that they were unable to return from the Pośrednia Turnia area to a safe place on their own. The rescuers found them severely hypothermic.

title: 'New Chapter' on Facebook and Instagram: Zuckerberg Reacts to Trump's Return
description: Popular social media is facing major changes. Mark Zuckerberg announced new solutions in platforms owned by Meta - less censorship and cooperation with President Donald Trump. From the context of the actions taken by the billionaire, it follows that it was the Republican's return to the White House that prompted him to make urgent changes.

title: Radosław Fogiel is a guest of the Afternoon Talk on RMF FM
description: The guest of the Afternoon Talk on RMF FM will be PiS MP, deputy chairman of the Sejm Foreign Affairs Committee Radosław Fogiel. We will ask what the Minister of Finance should decide on the subsidy for PiS and what steps the party intends to take if it does not receive the money.

title: A tourist and an 8-year-old boy were stuck on the peak. It was dark, frosty and windy
description: A man and an 8-year-old boy got stuck on Pośrednia Turnia in the Tatras. They were both very hypothermic, they couldn't get down even with the help of a rescuer. It was necessary to set up a heated tent.

title: It's raging in China, there are first cases in Europe. What is known about the hMPV virus?
description: The hMPV virus, which until now has mainly plagued residents of China, has reached Europe. On Tuesday, the first cases of infection were confirmed in Portugal. Chinese authorities, where the metapneumovirus has been spreading rapidly for several weeks, claim that the increase in cases is typical for the winter period. Symptoms of hMPV infection include high fever, cough and sore throat.

title: An extraordinary discovery in the Vilnius Cathedral. "It's a kind of sensation"
description: "This is a historic and sensational event" - comments Prof. Andrzej Betlej, director of the Wawel Royal Castle, on such an extraordinary discovery in the Vilnius Cathedral. In the basement of the temple - in a secret hiding place - they found, among other things, crowns, chains, rings, scepter and royal orb belonging to the rulers of Lithuania and Poland - Alexander Jagiellon, Sigismund Augustus' first wife Elizabeth of Habsburg and his second wife Barbara Radziwiłłówna.

title: Herbert Kickl undertook the mission of creating a new government in Austria
description: Herbert Kickl - the leader of the right-wing populist Freedom Party of Austria - has undertaken the task of forming a new government. The politician received this mission on Monday from the President of Austria Alexander Van der Bellen.

title: Norwegians break production records at Troll field
description: Over 42 billion cubic meters of natural gas - that's how much drilling platforms located on Troll, Norway's largest gas field, have delivered in the last 12 months. That's more than twice as much as Poland's annual consumption of this raw material.

title: Subsidy for PiS? "Let's not reward them for breaking the law"

title: Putin's absurd "order." Soldiers in Ukraine are supposed to wear this
description: Russian dictator Vladimir Putin has ordered his initials to be engraved on the links of chains for crosses that are to be given to participants in the invasion of Ukraine; commanders of military units, Kremlin spokesman Dmitry Peskov said.

title: New thread on the Warsaw tragedy. "We will establish"
description: The prosecutor's office, which is dealing with the case of the tragic accident in Warsaw, will also conduct its activities at the courier company. The 14-year-old died after being hit by a courier delivering packages from UPS. The suspect in causing the accident had a previous conviction and was banned from driving.

title: "I don't want to waste my time." Czarzasty on the Romanowski case
description: The case of Marcin Romanowski is not the most important topic for me - said Deputy Speaker Włodzimierz Czarzasty after the session of the Presidium of the Sejm. At the same time, he confirmed that the PiS MP, who is in Hungary, will not receive remuneration.

title: Romanowski's Case. They're Cutting Him Off from Money. There's a Decision
description: The Presidium of the Sejm has taken up the issue of the MP's remuneration for Marcin Romanowski. - He will not receive remuneration - said Marshal Szymon Hołownia.

title: Health education will not be mandatory? Nowacka on seven changes in schools
description: What about smartphones in schools? Will the Ministry of National Education lower the permissible threshold of unexcused absences? The head of the Ministry of National Education talked about the ministry's plans for next year.

title: Telewizja Republika launches campaign against Owsiak. Appeals to give money to it, not WOŚP
description: For years, the PiS authorities did not want to support the Great Orchestra of Christmas Charity. WOŚP and Jerzy Owsiak were even fired from TVP. Now PiS is announcing that Owsiak will be held accountable, and the media sympathetic to him are urging Poles not to pay to the Orchestra.

title: McDonald's inundated with allegations. More than 700 injured
description: Harassment, discrimination and homophobia.

description: They were unable to get down on their own.

description: There are fatalities.

description: The car was coming from the opposite direction.

title: Nawałka returns to the coach's bench. Match against Brazil at the Silesian Stadium
description: The TVP.Info portal confirms.

title: Horrible news from Portugal. It's about a new dangerous virus
description: On Tuesday, Portugal confirmed its first cases of hMPV infection, echoing the rapid spread of the pathogen in China. Symptoms of hMPV infection resemble flu, with patients complaining of high fever, cough and sore throat.

title: Progress in investigation after damage to undersea cables. Anchor now on the surface
description: The Swedish Navy has recovered the anchor of the tanker Eagle S, suspected of damaging undersea cables in the Baltic Sea, from the Gulf of Finland, Finnish radio Yle reported. The evidence in the investigation, which has been ongoing since December, has been handed over to Finnish authorities. The HMS Belos, which brought the item to the surface, has turned back toward Sweden, and experts have begun technical examinations of the ship's item.

title: A 15-year-old robbed a currency exchange office in Gubin. Everything was recorded
description: A 15-year-old thief fell like a plum into a compote. He had barely had time to enjoy the loot he had stolen, and he was already handcuffed. The teenager robbed a currency exchange office in Gubin. He enjoyed the stolen goods for only a few hours. His reprehensible act was recorded by cameras.

title: Drama on the stairs. Pensioner dies
description: A fall down the stairs ended tragically for a 67-year-old resident of Gniezno (Wielkopolska Province). Medical assistance was called for the injured man. Unfortunately, the pensioner's life could not be saved.

title: The World Cup is on hiatus, but the Poles won't be resting. Here's what awaits them
description: The World Cup will have an 11-day break after the competition in Bischofshofen. The Poles' rivals are already enjoying their time off. The White and Reds, on the other hand, have an intense weekend ahead of them. On Saturday, they will fight for medals in Zakopane.

title: It is known what will happen with the money for Romanowski. Hołownia makes it clear
description: Marcin Romanowski will not receive a parliamentary allowance or salary — Szymon Hołownia informed on Tuesday, assuring that the politician "remains an MP". The Speaker of the Sejm indicated that he can still count on a lump sum to maintain his parliamentary office. — Until the Sejm passes an amendment to the act on the performance of the mandate of a deputy and senator — he noted.

title: Will athletes have trouble traveling to the games? Another installment of Piesiewicz's war with Nitras
description: Radosław Piesiewicz, the president of the Polish Olympic Committee, and Sławomir Nitras, the Minister of Sport and Tourism, have been in dispute for months. Their main axis is the salary that the president of the Polish Olympic Committee is to receive. It turns out that the dispute may have serious consequences for athletes. Piesiewicz confessed that there may be "difficulties" in sending all athletes who will receive qualifications to the upcoming games.

title: Trudeau will go. It was under his rule that protesters were persecuted
description: Bartłomiej Pejo believes that Justin Trudeau's resignation is very good news. The Confederation MP indicated several reasons.

title: Szydło: Donald Tusk will not back down because he has gone too far
description: – The government has crossed certain boundaries. Donald Tusk will not back down, because he has gone too far – says former Prime Minister Beata Szydło, PiS MEP, in an interview with DoRzeczy.pl.

title: "The consequences are very simple." Hołownia on the Romanowski case
description: The case with Mr. Marcin Romanowski is clear – stated Marshal Szymon Hołownia. The PiS MP will not lose all his benefits from the Sejm.

title: Lisicki: Owsiak was serving Tusk. Ziemkiewicz: Now he is defending him
description: I remembered what Jerzy Owsiak was up to during the last election campaign. Apart from everything else, he won Tusk the election to a large extent. We had mass billboards, supposedly for charity. It was an example of terrible meanness, hypocrisy – says Paweł Lisicki.

title: The leading cause of death in the world is... abortion
description: Abortion once again ranked first among the leading causes of death in 2024.

title: Trump 2.0. and Poland: National Review's Strong Suggestion to Tusk's Government
description: According to the "National Review," the political course of Donald Tusk's government will pose a problem for President Donald Trump in Polish-American relations.

title: The Blue General Knowledge Quiz Will Blow You Away. Who Will Win 11/11?
description: See if you can get a full set of points in our blue general knowledge quiz. We have prepared eleven questions for you that are related to the color blue. So, are there any champions here who will get at least 8/11?

title: What about Marcin Romanowski's salary? Hołownia: The matter is clear
description: - No one deprived him of his mandate, nor did he resign from it himself - this is what Sejm Speaker Szymon Hołownia said on Tuesday about PiS MP Marcin Romanowski, who is in Hungary. However, the decision of the politician of Jarosław Kaczyński's party has an impact on the finances of the parliamentarian. What about the money paid to the MP?

title: Almost all of Poland with alerts. IMGW has issued warnings
description: Weather will include rain and sleet. At night, the temperature will be below zero, which will cause icy roads and sidewalks. IMGW has issued warnings for almost all of Poland.
