description: Ukrainian drones attacked a fuel depot in the city of Engels in the Saratov region in western Russia; a fire broke out there and about 25 strong explosions were heard, the independent Russian channel Astra on Telegram reported on Wednesday morning. Engels is home to a Russian strategic aviation base.

title: The temperature at work has inflamed the government. There is no consent to change the regulations
description: Complicated, unrealistic, paralyzing companies and even threatening state security - these are some of the reservations of the ministries regarding the regulations regulating temperature in the workplace, proposed by the Ministry of Labor - reports "Dziennik Gazeta Prawna".

title: Mexico to the Rescue of Cuba. It Will Increase Oil Exports by 43.5 Percent
description: Cuba, which has been in an energy crisis for several months, is receiving increasing supplies of crude oil from Mexico. Between January and October alone, they increased by 43.5 percent.

title: The Polish presidency will promote itself with... apples. The ministry has ordered over 82 thousand of them.
description: The Ministry of Agriculture and Rural Development has ordered over 82,000 apples for meetings organized as part of the Polish presidency of the Council of the European Union - the Ministry of Agriculture informed PAP. Polish apples have become the official fruit of the presidency and will be served to participants of the events.

title: The government is pouring money into the arms industry. Half a billion will flow to the "Narew"
description: The Ministry of State Assets has recapitalized the Polish Armaments Group, which is responsible for the modernization programs of Poland's defense capabilities, with an amount of PLN 478 million - reports Wednesday's "Rzeczpospolita".

title: Will Canada Become Part of the US? Trudeau: Zero Chance
description: There is not the slightest chance that Canada will become part of the United States, Canadian Prime Minister Justin Trudeau wrote on social media on Tuesday, commenting on statements by American President-elect Donald Trump about the annexation of Canada.

title: PIP: over PLN 54 million went to collectively dismissed PKP Cargo employees
description: Following an inspection by the National Labor Inspectorate, over PLN 54 million has already been paid to collectively dismissed PKP Cargo employees, PIP head Marcin Stanecki told PAP. The inspection at the company focused on cases of non-payment of due wages and other benefits.

title: Germany presses EU to reduce some sanctions on Syria
description: Germany is proposing that the EU reduce some sanctions on the Syrian banking and energy sectors in exchange for social reforms and guarantees on non-proliferation of weapons, the Financial Times reported on Tuesday, citing its sources.

title: Kosovo is the poorest country in the Balkans
description: Kosovo remains the poorest country in the Balkans, with the highest unemployment rate in the region - according to the World Bank's findings, presented on Tuesday by Kosovo's RTV21 television.

title: Undersea cables under NATO's care. The alliance will send 10 ships
description: Around 10 NATO ships will take part in a mission to protect underwater infrastructure in the Baltic Sea. They will sail close to cables and other installations to reduce the risk of further acts of sabotage in the region. The first ships will appear at sea at the end of the week, and the operation is expected to last until April, Finnish radio Yle reported.

title: The long-awaited Polish series is here. "It will keep you in suspense and make you think"
description: One of the most anticipated Polish series of this year has appeared on the Netflix platform, "Wzgórze pies" based on the novel by Jakub Żulczyk. The main roles will be played by Robert Więckiewicz and Mateusz Kościukiewicz, accompanied by Jaśmina Polak and Wojciech Zieliński. It promises to be a hit.

title: New obligation for owners of houses, apartments and hotels. Check if the changes also apply to you
description: From the end of December 2024, new regulations have been in force imposing the obligation to install smoke and carbon monoxide (CO) detectors in apartments, rented houses, rooms and places of accommodation. However, not all buildings must be equipped with them from 23 December 2024. Who does this obligation apply to and from when? You will find out in this article.

title: Mazda Changes Style and Technology: Here's a New SUV to Replace the CX-5
description: The new Mazda CX-5 will change not only its appearance and proportions. The manufacturer from Hiroshima is also focusing on proprietary drive solutions that will surprise when combined with combustion engines. In addition, the Japanese are building their own gigafactory. What can drivers expect?

title: The End of the Era of Affordable Housing? Prices Are Rising Despite Sales Falling. What's Happening?
description: In the fourth quarter of 2024, developers in the six largest markets in Poland sold 9.6 thousand apartments, which means an increase of 4.9% compared to the previous quarter - according to data from JLL. Despite this positive result, the total number of apartments sold in Poland last year did not exceed 40 thousand, which means a decrease of 31% year-on-year.

title: Massive fire in Los Angeles' celebrity district, 30,000 residents evacuated
description: Dantesque scenes unfold in a celebrity-filled Los Angeles neighborhood as firefighters battle a brush and tree fire in Pacific Palisades. The blaze spread to 510 hectares in a matter of hours Tuesday. 30,000 residents were ordered to evacuate due to life-threatening conditions.

title: Potato doughnuts from Ewa Wachowicz. An alternative to the classic ones.
description: Carnival is a time of doughnuts, angel wings and all kinds of sweets that are associated with this time. Ewa Wachowicz suggests potato doughnuts. Sounds a bit strange? Maybe, but how does it taste.

title: Luna complains about her rich parents. "Their financial status interferes with my career"
description: Singer Luna is the daughter of millionaire Andrzej Wielgomas, founder and owner of the Dawtona company. Last year's representative of Poland at Eurovision claims that, contrary to appearances, she has more troubles than benefits from her parents' wealth.

title: Do you have such a driving license? You have to go to the office. They gave the dates
description: Drivers have a new obligation imposed on them by the amendment to the regulations. Do you have such a driving license? Up to 15 million people must go to the office. When should an application for replacement be submitted? The deadlines have already been set.

title: Here's a new whip for drivers. Important changes coming in January 2025
description: A new whip for drivers. In January, a system will be launched that will allow employers to automatically check employees' driving licenses every day at 6:00. The Ministry of Digital Affairs announces 100% effectiveness of checks.

title: Does this send shivers down some of your spines? The military is coming for you. It's going to start in less than a month
description: Since there has been a war on our eastern border, such a call sends shivers down the spines of young people. Like every year, the army will check who is fit to be a soldier. It must have in reserve those whom it will take in its boots. Qualification committees rule on who can be drafted into the army if necessary.

title: What does the change of government in Germany mean for Poland? Expert has no illusions
description: What awaits Polish-German relations after the early parliamentary elections? Dr. Agnieszka Łada-Konefał from the German Institute for Polish Affairs has no great illusions...

title: Donald Trump Does Not Rule Out Using Force Against Denmark and Panama. The President-Elect's Terrifying Ideas
description: President-elect Donald Trump said he could not rule out the use of force to achieve his goals of control over Greenland and the Panama Canal. He also announced a name change for the Gulf of Mexico...

title: 600 plus for dentistry from the new year. Big change in dental treatment "on the National Health Fund" What to do to get this money?
description: Those who can't afford it have ruin in their mouths, those who have money spend a fortune in a private office, where the prices are jaw-dropping. This is what dental treatment looks like in our country. And few people know that paying a health insurance contribution means that we don't always have to pay for everything. This year there has been a big change in the basket of dental benefits under the National Health Fund. You can get 600 plus for a dentist.

title: A notarial deed does not protect the seller of real estate. How to get around this loophole in the law?
description: Theoretically, a purchase-sale transaction for an apartment, house or plot of land concluded before a notary protects both parties. Few people realize that the lack of one important record in the document can cost the seller not only the loss of rights to the property, but also the money from its sale. So how can the seller protect themselves and their property from dishonest buyers?

title: Drivers are complaining, and rightly so. Here are the most congested cities in Poland
description: 110 hours in Łódź, 107 in Wrocław, 106 in Poznań – that's how much time drivers lost during rush hour last year. The development of transport infrastructure does not help to decongest cities.

title: Gas prices in Europe are rising. Raw material stocks in storage are falling rapidly
description: Low temperatures and the suspension of Russian crude transit through Ukraine have pushed prices to their highest level since October 2023.

title: Teachers' remuneration regulations - 20 most common mistakes made by councillors
description: We have analyzed court rulings so that you don't have to. The most common errors in granting bonuses to teachers. Some can even lead to the invalidation of entire resolutions by governors.

title: Functional supplement for a teacher in a new position. 9 most common mistakes
description: The functional allowance for teachers, as it results from the analysis of the decisions of the voivodes, in the resolutions of the bodies running educational institutions, is often incorrectly regulated. On what principles and to whom should it be awarded and where do municipalities most often make mistakes in this regard.

title: Teacher Motivational Supplement: 6 Most Common Mistakes That Can Affect Your Salary
description: The motivational allowance for teachers is not mandatory. However, it is in the rules concerning the criteria for awarding it and its amount that most mistakes are made by councilors when adopting it. Check which provisions have already been questioned and whether this applies to your situation.

title: Good news for passengers. It's about the renovation of the Warsaw cross-city line
description: Railway workers are inclined to renovate two tunnels of the Warsaw cross-city line at the same time - the long-distance and the suburban one.

title: Oil ambush for Trump. Biden delivered a symbolic blow to the new US president
description: Joe Biden is forcing his successor to fight a potentially costly political and legal battle over offshore drilling concessions.

title: Russian gas is not flowing through Ukraine to Europe. Slovakia and Moldova are doing fine, Transnistria is freezing
description: Moldova and Slovakia, which could be hit the hardest by Kiev's decision to halt Russian gas transit, have managed to cope with their problems. The situation in separatist Transnistria is dramatic.

title: Brown Austria with a touch of establishment? The far right may have a problem
description: The far-right Austrian Freedom Party (FPÖ) has a chance to take power in the country, but it faces difficult talks about a future coalition with the outgoing ruling party.

title: 'Migration and taxes, stupid.' Here are the Trump administration's priorities for its first 100 days in office
description: Republicans are debating a legislative strategy for the new administration's first 100 days. Immigration and tax issues are top priorities.

title: Sommer: Negationist PR instead of climate revolution [OPINION]
description: When, during his first term in the White House, Donald Trump withdrew the American signature from the Paris climate agreement, it bordered on blasphemy. A little over a year earlier, diplomats had successfully concluded the first such far-reaching climate protection agreement among almost 200 countries.

title: How to Arrest a President: South Korea's Political Crisis Intensifies
description: The political crisis in South Korea has led to a deterioration of the economic situation.

title: Sławomir Mentzen indicated who he would entrust with the role of the president's spokesman
description: - Grzegorz Braun is a very nice person, but it should be the case that the spokesman explains himself through the president, and not the president through the spokesman - said the Confederation's candidate in the presidential elections, Sławomir Mentzen, when asked whether he would consider choosing Grzegorz Braun as the head of the Chancellery of the President.

title: Russia-Ukraine War. Day 1050
description: On February 24, 2022, Russia launched a full-scale invasion of Ukraine. At night, Ukrainian drones attacked Bryansk, Rostov, Saratov, and Belgorod regions.

title: Debate. Travel agents: We guarantee stability and quality. It is worth investing in us
description: Tour operators and agents live in symbiosis. It is not worth jeopardizing good relationships for short-term benefits - said the panelists of the Tourism Leaders Meeting organized by our editorial team.

title: The transparency of public life is one of the foundations of the rule of law.
description: A municipal company performing public tasks is obliged to provide public information concerning it and related to the activities it undertakes, upon request or in the Public Information Bulletin.

title: Ministry of Digital Affairs responds to the tragedy in Wola. Transport companies will receive a new tool
description: The courier driver who fatally hit a 14-year-old in Warsaw's Wola district on Friday had an active driving ban. The Minister of Digital Affairs announced that in January he will provide transport companies and passenger transport intermediaries with the ability to automatically verify drivers' licenses.

title: Business: There is no coordination of economic policy in Donald Tusk's government. And there is a lot to improve
description: Business organizations hope for more decisive deregulation this year and for a serious debate on migration policy that takes into account the needs of the economy.

title: Podcast "Twój Biznes": NAREW program accelerates - 500 million for air defense
description: It's Wednesday, January 8 - Bartłomiej Kawałek invites you to "Twój Biznes", the daily economic podcast of "Rzeczpospolita". Today we will talk about half a billion zlotys for the NAREW program, changes in Facebook's moderation policy, Trump's plans for allies and the agreement for the supply of Romanian gas to Germany.

title: Where in Poland do retirees receive the highest pensions? New data points to one region
description: The highest pensions and annuities in Poland are received by residents of the Silesian province. Their average is over PLN 900 higher than the average of the region, where pensions and annuities are the lowest in the country. What is the situation in other provinces? What are the average pensions themselves? And what benefits do farmers receive?

title: Donald Trump has not ruled out the use of force to take over Greenland and the Panama Canal
description: During the press conference, Donald Trump stressed that Greenland and the Panama Canal are crucial to the security of the United States.

title: The new supplement from January 1, 2025 is up to PLN 2,520. Who will get it?
description: From the beginning of 2025, some people receiving a social pension may receive a so-called supplement. The benefit of PLN 2,520 is paid together with the social pension. What do you need to know about this supplement? When is it necessary to submit an application?

title: What is HMPV? In China, the number of people infected with the virus is growing
description: In China, the number of HMPV infections is increasing. Emerging reports of overcrowded hospitals raise concerns. What is this virus and what are its symptoms?

title: Government backs down on giving migrants cash to return to home country
description: The idea of ​​giving foreigners cash in hand as part of the so-called reintegration, however, ended up in the trash. It stirred controversy in the management of the Ministry of Interior and Administration itself.

title: The Germans have finally started buying arms and are setting a record
description: Last year, the German parliament approved the implementation of 97 arms projects worth more than 25 million euros. A year ago, there were only 55. This means that in 2024, MPs will approve arms purchases worth more than 45 billion euros.

title: What weapons will the Polish Army buy in 2025?
description: Borsuk combat vehicles are a certainty, K2 tanks have a chance, and submarines are a "matter of honor". Although we will sign several large contracts for new weapons this year, the time of large contracts signed every few weeks is probably behind us.

title: Record number of tourists in Antalya. Poles in the top
description: Russia, Germany, Great Britain, Poland and the Netherlands – this is the list of countries from which the most visitors come to the Turkish resort on the Mediterranean Sea, Antalya. Last year, a record number of visitors was broken there, there were 17 million.

title: Łukasz Guza: Leave the National Electoral Commission alone
description: Another state institution (the National Electoral Commission) has become a hostage to the constant and increasingly harmful war between PiS and PO.

title: Marek Kutarba: Local government VAT tax groups
description: In presenting you with another edition of the “Administration” supplement, I would like to recommend to your special attention three materials devoted to the possibility of creating VAT tax groups by municipalities and their municipal companies.

title: ChatGPT 'prompted' Tesla driver who exploded in Las Vegas
description: Matthew Livelsberger, 37, a U.S. Army soldier whose body was found in a Tesla Cybertruck after it exploded outside the Trump International Hotel in Las Vegas, used ChataGPT to prepare for the car explosion.

title: Local government will not avoid tax on parking without a ticket
description: The inability to identify drivers who actually use parking spaces does not exclude VAT taxation.

title: Jacek Dubois: You will sit
description: Public opinion bases whether a violation of the law has occurred on the beliefs of the person who allegedly committed the violation.

title: Marek Migalski: Belweder is worth a mass. Rafał Trzaskowski cannot be an enemy of religion
description: When you look at Rafał Trzaskowski's staff, you get the impression that it's a group of Mexican revolutionaries who will soon start burning churches, nationalizing monasteries and repressing nuns and priests. This has to change, otherwise PiS will manage to glue the president of Warsaw to the image of an anticlerical who is out of touch with Polish reality.

title: Jarosław Kuisz: How to scare Poles?
description: 2025 will be a year of common scares. The months leading up to the presidential election will be filled with terror. Targowica, Prussian agents, and other demons of decline will pour out of screens large and small. Of course, interrupted by commercials and in versions updated to the 21st century. Polish politics will be raised to the level of a B-grade horror movie by algorithms from overseas.

title: Additional school holidays in autumn? MEN is looking into the matter
description: Students in Poland are overworked. Would better organization of the school year allow them to better distribute their strength over the ten school months? - We need to think about it - says Paulina Piechna-Więckiewicz, Deputy Minister of Education, in the podcast "Szkoła na nowo".

title: Andrzej Lepper is the patron of a new party in Poland. "The response is very big"
description: A group of activists has begun registering Andrzej Lepper's Samoobrona Odrodzenie. Although the late deputy prime minister was the embodiment of controversy in politics, smaller and larger groups are increasingly referring to him, and ideas for erecting monuments to him are also growing.

title: Zuzanna Dąbrowska: Why did Andrzej Duda not respond to Donald Tusk's invitation?
description: Andrzej Duda chose skiing in Kluszkowce instead of the inauguration of the EU presidency, so as not to endorse the current government, and Donald Tusk chose the EU summit in Brussels, not in Warsaw, to avoid promoting the president as the host. Here is Polish politics in a nutshell for the New Year.

title: Shahla Kazimova: There was already a lot of distrust towards Russia in Azerbaijan
description: After the tragedy of the Azerbaijani Airlines plane, the slogan "Putin, apologize!" appeared. In Azerbaijan, no one writes about the disaster anymore, but about the crime - says Dr. Shahla Kazimova, head of the Center for Azerbaijani Studies at the University of Warsaw, in the podcast "Globalny Chrząszcz".

title: Trump refused to rule out the use of force to occupy Greenland!
description: "I can't guarantee that when it comes to Panama and Greenland, but I can say this: we need them for economic security."

title: Trzaskowski faces a more difficult task than five years ago
description: As for the polls themselves, I would advise Nawrocki's campaign in particular not to look too much into them.

title: Massive fire in Los Angeles! 30,000 people evacuated
description: 13,000 buildings are at risk of fire.

title: PM Orban's advisor criticizes Tusk government's decisions
description: "During Hungary’s EU Presidency, we never allowed any potential bilateral disputes to affect our presidential responsibilities".

title: Elections and "gay marriages". These are the hopes of a neo-TVP journalist
description: "I wouldn't want us to be surprised by the result of the presidential election."

title: Trudeau: There is no chance of Canada becoming part of the US
description: There is not the slightest chance that Canada will become part of the United States, Canadian Prime Minister Justin Trudeau wrote on social media, commenting on statements by American President-elect Donald Trump about the annexation of Canada.

title: Was there an agreement on the Green Deal? Morawiecki promises a case of wine
description: The former prime minister also proposed a bet that if someone proves that he has signed the European Green Deal, Morawiecki will buy him "a case of good Polish wine".

title: ONLY WITH US. Wąsik: PO's performance ended in disgrace
description: "This embarrassment turns out to be even greater because it turns out that when the Platform governs, there are situations in which disloyal or dishonest Polish state officials prefer to earn money on corruption or wait for their salary."

title: Orban's advisor speaks out against Tusk's government decisions
description: "This is another striking example of how liberals are using the law as a tool to silence their political opponents."

title: Failure of the Szczecin CHP plant. Possible disruptions in the supply of heat and hot water
description: In the northern areas of the left-bank part of Szczecin, including the city center, there may be disruptions in the supply of heat and hot water. This is related to the failure of the Szczecin Power Plant. PGE, which owns the Szczecin power plant, is trying to diagnose the problem.

title: Massive Warehouse Fire in Bydgoszcz: Possible Cause Provided
description: The cause of the warehouse fire in Bydgoszcz was most likely damage to one of the heating elements. The fire extinguishing operation is still ongoing on site. The management of MMP Neupack Polska assured that due to the production downtime, none of the crew will lose their jobs.

title: Earthquake in Tibet. Number of missing people unknown
description: More than 400 people have been rescued by services after Tuesday's earthquake in Tibet - Chinese authorities reported. The search and rescue operation has been ongoing for several dozen hours and is taking place in difficult conditions with temperatures below zero. So far, 126 people have been confirmed dead, almost 200 injured.

title: Judge Laskowski: when I read it, I felt sorry for the Minister of Finance
description: Supreme Court Judge Dr. Michał Laskowski said in "Rozmowa Piaseckiego" on TVN24 that when he read the resolution of the National Electoral Commission, he felt sorry for the Minister of Finance. - The burden of this decision, which was not easy and unprecedented, was shifted onto him - he stated.

title: Organist allegedly sent pornographic content to children. First hearings and motions to court
description: Seven teenagers have already been questioned in the case of pornographic content that the organist of one of the parishes in Małopolska was supposed to have sent. According to the prosecutor's office, "due to the content of the statements" motions are being submitted to the court to question more minors.

title: An accident in front of tourists. A plane crashed near the island, there are dead and injured
description: A light aircraft with six tourists on board crashed near Rottnest Island off the coast of Perth, Western Australia. Three people died, including the pilot and two passengers.

title: Mirosława Marcheluk has died. She played in a cult comedy
description: Mirosława Marcheluk, a film and theatre actress, known for her role as the Advisor to Her Excellency in "Seksmisja" directed by Juliusz Machulski, has died. She was the director of the Nowy Theatre in Łódź, and a lecturer at the Film School in Łódź.

title: New Orlen exchange rate. CEO's announcements
description: Orlen will take a new course: rational transformation and business acceleration - announced the company's CEO Ireneusz Fąfara in "Rzeczpospolita". He added that the company is starting 2025 by sailing into the ocean of new challenges.

title: Today we are to find out the date of the presidential elections
description: Sejm Speaker Szymon Hołownia will announce the date of the first round of presidential elections on Wednesday, although they will not be formally called until next week. There are three possible dates: May 4, 11 or 18, however, the Speaker announced on Tuesday that there will definitely be no elections during the May Day weekend.

title: 13-year-old hit on crossing. Driver found
description: The driver who hit a 13-year-old girl on a pedestrian crossing in Milicz and drove away has been detained. He is an 81-year-old. The police have released a recording of the accident.

title: 32-year-old dies from stab wounds. One person is under supervision, the other is in custody
description: One person was taken to jail, and the other - a 21-year-old woman - was placed under police supervision. They are suspected of fatally attacking the 32-year-old with a knife. The incident took place on Poltawska Street in Koszalin.

title: "Action Plan" of the Ministry. Poland before the ECJ with a new position
description: The government has presented a new position before the Court of Justice of the European Union on the status of judges. It wants the CJEU to comment on the criteria for examining their independence and the possibility of national courts bypassing provisions that limit the effectiveness of EU law. During the hearing, the attorney representing Warsaw indicated that "according to data from November 2024, 3,142 judges, including judicial assessors, appointed by the new National Council of the Judiciary, adjudicate in Polish courts." This is over 30 percent of all judges.

title: A lot of work in the Sejm. One of the projects concerns the presidential elections
description: During the three-day session starting today, the Sejm will consider, among other things, the draft of the so-called incidental act concerning the determination of the validity of the presidential elections and the sanctions act. The deputies will also familiarize themselves with the program of the Polish presidency of the Council of the European Union and vote on the Senate amendments to the budget act.

title: Several meters high clouds of flame
description: Firefighters intervened in the town of Ługi near Mława, where a tractor-trailer truck caught fire. The vehicle caught fire when no one was inside.

title: "If I live to see tomorrow". Jurek Owsiak writes about threats he receives before the grand finale of WOŚP
description: Jurek Owsiak, the head of WOŚP, published an entry in which he reported threats against him. "Very specific threats, with a bomb in the background and the disposal of my person," he wrote. He added that it reminded him of the "baiting" of the murdered mayor of Gdańsk, Paweł Adamowicz. He informed that the cases had been forwarded to the police.

title: Lotto draw results
description: In Tuesday's Lotto draw, no one correctly selected all six numbers. This means that this year, not a single six has been recorded. The jackpot grows to six million zlotys. Here are the results of the Lotto and Lotto Plus draws from January 7, 2025.

title: 14-year-old Maksym is dead. His mother on the perpetrator of the accident: he should be punished justly
description: - This man should receive a just punishment, as provided for by Polish law - says the mother of a 14-year-old who was fatally hit in Warsaw's Wola district. On Tuesday, the court decided to impose a three-month arrest on the bus driver. Report "Uwaga!" TVN.

title: He reported that he was attacked and robbed by two men. He faces a severe penalty
description: He reported that two men beat him up and stole a bag with 22 thousand złoty. There were gaps in this story. When the police started to verify the information, it turned out that he had made everything up. The 22-year-old now faces up to eight years in prison.

title: A baby was born in a pontoon in the middle of the sea
description: During the crossing of migrants from Africa to the Canary Islands, a woman in a pontoon gave birth to a child, Salvamento Maritimo, the service responsible for safety in Spanish waters, reported on Tuesday.

title: The Eurojackpot jackpot is growing
description: There was no main prize in Tuesday's Eurojackpot draw. In Poland, the highest was the fourth-degree prize of almost PLN 677,000. Here are the numbers drawn on January 7, 2025.

title: An unlucky walk and an unexpected visit. They brought him what they found under the tree
description: On the last day of 2024, while walking around the Old Town, a resident of Bródno lost his driving license. On January 6, a week later, municipal guards brought it to his home. They found it that day under the Christmas tree by the ice rink.

title: Dangerous road conditions. IMGW warnings in many provinces
description: The Institute of Meteorology and Water Management has issued meteorological warnings. Yellow alerts for icy roads are in force almost throughout the country. Check the details.

title: He murdered his wife and reported her missing
description: 44-year-old Mateusz F. was accused of murdering his wife. He had previously reported her missing, but his version of events did not convince the police. They found the woman's body, and F. confessed to the crime.

title: Sudden, massive fire in Los Angeles' celebrity district, actors flee
description: Firefighters are battling an extremely fast-growing fire in Pacific Palisades, a district of Los Angeles where dozens of celebrities have homes. About 30,000 residents of the region have been ordered to evacuate due to life-threatening conditions. Jennifer Aniston, Michael Keaton, Adam Sandler, Tom Hanks and Bradley Cooper, among others, have their homes in this area. James Woods reported that his family had fled.

title: Who Are Xennials? This Generation Lives Completely Differently Than Their Parents
description: For millennials who are now forty, the theme song to the series "Forty-Year-Old" contains more incomprehensible sentences than ones they could agree with. A person born in 1980 will not think that "it's closer than further" - he is just entering the best period of his life. And he will burst out laughing at the advice "even though time drives you, laugh at this bastard, you are still capable of a lot", because it is clear to him that he can do as much as the young. Or even more.

title: Is a 70-year-old behind the wheel dangerous? "If only someone tried to take my license away!"
description: – I recently examined a professional driver who is 85 years old, all functions preserved, he did very well – says Andrzej Markowski, a traffic psychologist. That same day, he examined a 55-year-old and it turned out that he can no longer sit behind the wheel. The changes are far-reaching, poor orientation, delayed reactions.

title: There is no point in pursuing happiness. "It is worth feeling both joy and sadness"
description: Life is made up of many experiences, both good and bad. Each teaches something. It is not worth looking only for what is good and feeling disappointed when something does not happen as we expected. It is worth feeling both joy and sadness - says British writer and illustrator James Norbury.

title: "It's best not to let whales out of the building." Behind the scenes of fun in Las Vegas
description: A former employee of a Las Vegas casino recounted how a "whale" demanded female company, but was so picky that he made up his mind only after viewing nearly a hundred potential partners. The inventiveness of the wealthy who party in casinos seems inexhaustible.

title: The Honeymoon Phase: How Many Times Can We Experience It in a Relationship?
description: Did you know that somewhere out there, in the big wide world, your perfect other half is out there? The person of your dreams and desires, ready to fulfill your every fantasy, satisfy all your needs and live with you in a state of eternal happiness? Yes, of course. Santa Claus exists too. There is no such thing as a perfect partner, just as there is no such thing as a perfect couple (as the old joke goes, there are only two kinds of couples: those who are in a wonderful relationship and those you really know well).

title: Achilles' Diet Was Very Healthy. Here's What Ancient Greeks Ate
description: Traces of ancient Greek cuisine can be found in the cuisine of modern Greece. Two popular gastronomic products of this region have ancient origins. However, the ancient Greeks ate

title: How American Fast Food Conquered the World? "There Could Be a Greater Injustice"
description: For half a century, the fast food chain has encircled the world. Cheap, unhealthy, quickly consumed food has become a culinary symbol of the United States. It is hard to imagine a greater injustice, because the local cuisine is in no way inferior to that of France or Italy.

title: He quit his job in the office and became a handyman. "I hear: '250 PLN for 20 minutes'? And the counting starts"
description: I recently found a calendar from my first year, I made 600 PLN in a month. I didn't value myself. I spent three days fixing it, but I said: "Great that it works, give me five bucks and it'll be fine" - Marcin Jankowski tells us why instead of sitting in an office, he became a handyman.

title: Dispute between Polish company and Ukraine over millions. Will be resolved by an "impartial" arbitrator
description: The Polish company Alfa, which deals with, among other things, delivering weapons to Ukraine, has problems settling several transactions. So it decided to seek justice in an arbitration court in Kiev. What happened next resembles a legal farce.

title: On all fours. Kaczyński managed to save PiS. "This year will be much worse"
description: Was it a bad year for Jarosław Kaczyński? — the hosts of the podcast "Stan Wyjatkowy" wonder. After losing power, Kaczyński was completely broken. The party was in total stagnation. In 2024, the situation changed.

title: Deputy Speaker of the Sejm appealed to Kosiniak-Kamysz. "Buy yourself a bigger mirror"
description: - If there is a situation in which groups that are fed up with these promises do not go to the elections and Mr. Nawrocki wins the presidential elections, then I will tell Władek Kosiniak - Władek, buy yourself a slightly bigger mirror and look into it more often - said Włodzimierz Czarzasty in the Graffiti program.

title: Luxury Neighborhood on Fire. Major Fire in Los Angeles
description: Firefighters are battling a blaze in Pacific Palisades, an exclusive Los Angeles neighborhood known for its celebrity residences. The blaze broke out in brush and wooded areas near the local beach. 30,000 residents were ordered to evacuate due to the immediate threat to their lives.

title: Lotto Draw Results. Check Winning Numbers
description: On Tuesday, January 7, 2025, the draws for the number games run by Totalizator Sportowy took place. Which numbers turned out to be lucky? Here are the results of the draw: Ekstra Pensja, Ekstra Premia, EuroJackpot, Kaskada, Lotto, Lotto Plus, Mini Lotto, Multi Multi.

title: Sławomir Mentzen: The Minister of Finance should pay money to PiS
description: The Minister of Finance Andrzej Domański should pay PiS money - said Sławomir Mentzen in a morning interview on RMF FM. "Every official should act within the limits and on the basis of the law" - commented the co-chairman of the Confederation. This issue was also raised by a question from a listener, which Tomasz Terlikowski's guest drew during the program. "Money from the subsidy for PiS or for charity?" - Mr. Tadeusz from Krapkowice wanted to know. "By law, the money should go to PiS," Mentzen stated.

title: Soldier shot at civilians. Commander for RMF FM: There were no problems with him before
description: "The rapid reaction forces acted immediately. Two minutes after the signal that the soldier had left the unit, we had all the people on standby" - General Arkadiusz Szkutnik, commander-in-chief of military operations in Podlasie, tells RMF FM about the incident in Mielnik. On New Year's Day, a 24-year-old soldier shot at a car driven by a father and his 13-year-old daughter. We also talk to the commander of the Safe Podlasie operation about the sense of security of the region's residents and ask how the tactics of migrants trying to illegally cross our eastern border have changed...

title: Massive fire in Los Angeles. Evacuation of 30,000 people, "apocalyptic scenes"
description: Firefighters are battling a brush and tree fire in Pacific Palisades, a district of Los Angeles full of celebrity residences. On Tuesday, the fire spread to 510 hectares in a matter of hours. 30,000 residents were ordered to evacuate due to life-threatening conditions. "This could mean the difference between life and death," said Margaret Stewart, a spokeswoman for the fire department, quoted by CNN. The media is calling it an "apocalyptic situation." Joe Biden has issued a statement and an appeal to residents.

title: Problems with heating and hot water. Szczecin is fighting a failure
description: Due to the failure of the Szczecin CHP plant, there may be disruptions in the supply of heat and hot water in the northern areas of the left-bank part of the city - Szczecińska Energetyka Cieplna reported in a statement.

title: Razem Deputy Chairman: Biejat decided to cheat her own party
description: "Magdalena Biejat made a choice. When Razem decided to go into opposition, she decided that she was part of Donald Tusk's camp and decided to basically cheat her own party (...). Magdalena Biejat made certain promises to the Razem party: that she would respect the results of the party referendum, that under no circumstances would she run in the elections for family reasons" - said Maciej Konieczny, deputy chairman of the Razem Party's Parliamentary Group, in Rozmowa at 7:00 on Radio RMF24.

title: Tragic year on the roads. Terrifying data on victims
description: 1881 people died in 2024 on Polish roads, and nearly 25 thousand were injured. There were over 21.5 thousand accidents. These are preliminary data, reported by Senior Commissioner Robert Opas from the Road Traffic Office of the Police Headquarters.

title: Trudeau to Trump: Canada Will Never Become Part of the US
description: There is not the slightest chance that Canada will become part of the United States - Canadian Prime Minister Justin Trudeau wrote on social media, commenting on the statements of American president-elect Donald Trump on the annexation of Canada.

title: NATO mission in the Baltic Sea. They are sending ships
description: Around 10 NATO ships will take part in the mission to protect underwater infrastructure in the Baltic Sea. They will sail near cables and other installations to reduce the risk of further acts of sabotage in the region. The first ships will appear at sea at the end of the week. The operation is to last until April, Finnish radio Yle reported.

title: Several hundred marijuana bushes, 3 thousand methamphetamine tablets. Police strike against drug trade
description: Over 500 cannabis bushes, specialist equipment for their cultivation, ready-made marijuana and nearly 3,000 methamphetamine tablets with a black market value of over PLN 1 million were seized officers of the Central Bureau of Investigation of the Police in the West Pomeranian Voivodeship. Investigators also detained a 49-year-old man who is associated with the cultivation and trade of drugs.

title: The 560-year-old Jan Maria bell was "awakened" in Stargard
description: The largest medieval bell in Western Pomerania, located in the tower of the church of St. John the Baptist in Stargard, rang after several decades of silence. Its renovation cost over PLN 400,000. According to historians and bell founders, it is the third instrument of this class in Poland.

title: The senior wanted to drink tea. She had walked over 20 kilometers
description: A 78-year-old woman from a small town in Siedlce County walked over 20 kilometers at night along a national road. She passed her home and went in the opposite direction. Thanks to the police, the disoriented and hypothermic senior citizen was taken to hospital.

title: Jerzy Owsiak receives criminal threats. He revealed their content
description: Jerzy Owsiak receives criminal threats. He revealed their content

title: In winter, it is a deadly disease in Poland. Twice as many deaths
description: In winter, it is a deadly disease in Poland. Twice as many deaths

title: 13-year-old hit at crosswalk. Police question driver
description: 13-year-old hit at crosswalk. Police question driver

title: KO MP: First the Supreme Court reform, then the issue of subsidies for PiS
description: KO MP: First the Supreme Court reform, then the issue of subsidies for PiS

title: Weather forecast for winter break. IMGW says about anomaly
description: Weather forecast for winter break. IMGW says about anomaly

title: The Windmill Act is Back. "We've Learned Our Lesson"
description: The Windmill Act is Back. "We've Learned Our Lesson"

title: Mirosława Marcheluk is dead. Memorable role in "Sexmission"
description: Mirosława Marcheluk is dead. Memorable role in "Sexmission"

title: Massive fire in Russia. Drone "debris" hit Engels
description: Ukrainian drones attacked a fuel depot in the city of Engels in the Saratov region in western Russia. According to information from independent Russian channels, the depot stores aviation fuel for the Russian strategic air base located in the city.

title: Pacific Palisades Fire: President Biden Urges Residents to Help
description: The celebrity-favorite Los Angeles district has been battling a fire since Tuesday. The fire has spread over 500 hectares, and 30,000 residents have been ordered to evacuate. President Joe Biden has issued a statement and an appeal to residents.

title: A 68-year-old pedestrian was walking on the sidewalk. He was hit
description: Police in Żywiec are investigating the circumstances of an accident in which a 24-year-old Opel driver hit a 68-year-old pedestrian walking on the sidewalk in Radziechowy. The injured man was taken to hospital with bodily injuries.

title: Banaś' Movement on the visa scandal. There will be notifications to the prosecutor's office
description: Marian Banaś announced that four notifications of suspicion of committing a crime regarding the visa scandal will be sent to the prosecutor's office today. - The notifications concern ministers - the head of NIK revealed on TVP Info.

title: Zelenskyy Goes to Rome, Insists on Meeting with Biden
description: Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelensky wants to meet with US President Joe Biden in Rome. Biden's visit to the Eternal City is a farewell.

title: Józefaciuk admonished the priest. "Is this how you celebrate?"
description: "Today is a holy day of obligation. Is that how you celebrate? Is that how you set an example?" wrote MP Marcin Józefaciuk from the Civic Coalition, addressing Father Janusz Chyła, parish priest from Chojnice. The discussion ensued after the priest's comment under a regular, informative entry about the Epiphany.

title: Police arrest wanted man in hit-and-run of 13-year-old girl
description: Police have detained a wanted driver who hit a 13-year-old girl on Tuesday in Milicz. As Radio ZET has established, the detainee is an 80-year-old man who was released after questioning.

title: Wirtualna Polska Morning. Journalism section
description: We invite you to the morning journalistic section of Wirtualna Polska. From Monday to Friday at 7:45 on the WP main page. We invite you to "Tłit" (7:45) and "Newsroom" (8:10).

title: NATO Special Operation. 10 Ships Are Sailing
description: NATO is sending about 10 ships to protect underwater infrastructure in the Baltic Sea. The first ships are to arrive by the end of the week. The special operation will last until April.

title: More money for armament. A gigantic amount
description: The Ministry of State Assets has recapitalized the Polish Armaments Group, which is responsible for the modernization programs of Poland's defense capabilities, with the amount of PLN 478 million - reports Wednesday's "Rzeczpospolita".

title: "I'd love to go with him." Kierwiński replies to Nawrocki
description: - If Mr. Nawrocki wants to help people who suffered in the flood, then I invite you - said the Minister for Reconstruction after the Flood Marcin Kierwiński, reacting to the words of the President of the Institute of National Remembrance on this matter. He added that "he will gladly go with him to the dam in Stronie to present him with a monument to the irresponsibility of his buddies from PiS".

title: They will get more money. Double raises for Tusk and Kaczyński
description: 2025 will be exceptionally generous for Donald Tusk and Jarosław Kaczyński. The state budget provides for 5 percent pay rises for public sector employees, including politicians. The heads of PO and PiS will gain twice as much - also from pension increases.

title: Krajew: Trump Wants Ceasefire, No Matter What The Cost
description: - Donald Trump did not have and still does not have any strategy towards Ukraine. He wants to bring about a ceasefire to show that he is a strong leader. He does not care what cost Ukraine and Europe will bear - says Oleksandr Krayev, an Americanist and expert at the Foreign Policy Council "Ukrainian Prism".

title: It happened at night. Americans pay tribute to former president
description: It happened while you were sleeping. This is what global agencies recorded on the night from Tuesday to Wednesday.

title: Czarzasty vs. Hołownia. Strong words were said
description: - All decisions that are currently being made in the Supreme Court with the participation of neo-judges, we as the Left consider ineffective and legally flawed - said the deputy speaker of the Sejm and co-chairman of the New Left on TV24 in the evening. In this way, he opposed the idea of ​​Marshal Szymon Hołownia regarding the draft of the incidental act.

title: Confession of an SEO Expert: "The Pressure of Fighting for Traffic Is Exhausting People Working in Portals"
description: Anyone who worked in a portal in the era of Google and Facebook doesn't laugh in a circus. And if they do, it's through tears. I invite you to a big conversation with Jakub Sawa, an experienced digital specialist, about how it really is with Google, SEO, Discover and the fight for traffic with publishers.

title: New news channel in Polish. The editorial team includes Blajer and Laskowska
description: On Wednesday, January 15, the Polish language version of Euronews will be launched again - the Wirtualnemedia.pl portal has learned. According to our information, Paweł Blajer, previously associated with TVP Info and TVN24, has been appointed head of the pan-European news channel's office in Warsaw. The editor of the channel is Agnieszka Laskowska, who recently said goodbye to Polsat News.

title: Why Politics Is Coming Back to Facebook: And Why It Should Scare Us
description: Political content will return to Facebook with full force, and "censorship" - as Mark Zuckerberg called content moderation - will end. This should be read as terrible news for societies on both sides of the ocean. The words of the Meta boss should be read especially carefully, because they also contain terrible predictions for the media and people who fight bigtech to respect their rights.

title: There will be another TV multiplex. We know when the search for its operator will begin
description: The number of digital terrestrial television multiplexes will increase again. The Office of Electronic Communications is finalizing preparations for the competition for the MUX-5 operator - We expect that the competition may be announced at the beginning of March this year - informs Wirtualnemedia.pl a representative of the Office of Electronic Communications.

title: Radio Łódź "cuts out the region"? Local correspondents are leaving the station
description: Local correspondents are leaving Radio Łódź. Two left in the fall, and now two more people are leaving the station. - We didn't fire anyone. These people decided to change jobs themselves - explains Monika Czerska, the station's program director, to Wirtualnemedia.pl. She assures that obtaining information from the region is not at risk, and there is more local content on air than under the previous bosses in 2023.

title: Change after 23 years. Lech Kaczoń stopped leading the Outdoor Advertising Chamber
description: Lech Kaczoń is no longer the director and president of the board of the OOHlife Chamber of Commerce. He held these positions for 23 years. The Chamber has now elected new authorities - Wojciech Wójcik, president of the RW Media Group, has become its president.

title: Another departure from TVN's "Fakty". Two departments merged
description: Michał Wituła, head of the graphics department of "Fakty" TVN, has said goodbye to the company after nearly 17 years. As the Wirtualnemedia.pl portal has learned, the company has undergone restructuring, which has combined the graphics departments of the leading daily TVN and the TVN24 news channel.

title: Radio Nowy Świat costs up by one million zlotys. However, patrons are growing
description: Since mid-December, the group of patrons of Radio Nowy Świat has grown by 600 people, and twice as many previous donors have increased their contributions to the station. This is the result of regular appeals from the editor-in-chief for financial support for the radio, whose operating costs - partly due to inflation - have increased by one million złoty in the past year. However, as representatives of the station assure, the station will remain free of advertisements.

title: Republika has begun writing about show business. The service will be taken over by the former editor-in-chief of "Super Express"
description: The recently launched show business service Blask Online by TV Republika will be spun off into a new company, where the head and one of the partners will be Sławomir Jastrzębowski, formerly editor-in-chief of "Super Express" - the Wirtualnemedia.pl portal has learned. - We are creating something that I would like to read and watch myself - Jastrzębowski tells us.

title: E-commerce on the offensive. Onet and WP publishers are chasing Interia (Mediapanel from December)
description: In December, the reach advantage of the Polsat-Interia Group over Ringier Axel Springer Polska and the Wirtualna Polska Group decreased slightly. The peak of the shopping season brought record results to several e-commerce platforms. Temu has already been visited by over 15 million Polish internet users.

title: Wirtualna Polska with a new boss in the advertising office. Transfer from RASP
description: Martyna Mizerska has taken the position of head of business operations in the advertising office of Wirtualna Polska. She will be responsible for optimizing and unifying operational processes.

title: Tomasz Raczek on parting ways with Channel Zero. "I won't let myself spit"
description: Tomasz Raczek spoke about the reasons for parting ways with Channel Zero. - The last area that interests Channel Zero viewers is culture. An additional element was that comments under my broadcasts were absolutely unacceptable - said the film critic.

title: VML Poland with a new creative director. Dawid Szczepaniak with a new role
description: Dawid Szczepaniak is leaving his position as creative director of the strategic and creative agency VML Poland after 16 years. He will be replaced in this role by Piotr Osiński.

title: New head of communication for Polenergia Group. He joined from Qemetica
description: Mirosław Kuk has taken the position of head of communications & PR at the Polenergia Group. For the last eight years he has been associated with the Qemetica industrial group (formerly Ciech).

title: Marketing Communication Association SAR has a new director. She won the competition
description: Katarzyna Chodacka joined the SAR Marketing Communication Association team on January 2 as strategic and operational director.

title: Magda Gessler in a completely new role. How many viewers did the debut of the new program have?
description: "Magda cooks the Internet" is a new TVN program in which Magda Gessler talks to famous people. The first episode of the program, broadcast on Sunday, was watched by over 660 thousand viewers.

title: How many viewers did the program "As the saying goes, or Kasia u Bralczyka" have?
description: On average, 202 thousand viewers watched the program "Jak to się słowa, czyli Kasia Bralczyka" broadcast on TVP2 on Sunday afternoons - according to Nielsen data. The most watched episode attracted 287 thousand viewers.

title: Streaming Giant to Rise: Disney to Merge with Fubo
description: Sports streaming company Fubo ends lawsuit against Warner Bros. Discovery, The Walt Disney Company, and Fox Corporation’s joint platform Venu Sports. Disney has decided to merge Hulu Live TV with Fubo, creating one of the largest pay-TV providers in the U.S.

title: Broadcaster of new terrestrial station with 4 million profit. But no dividend planned
description: Red Carpet Media Group, which broadcasts, among others, the ViDoc TV station broadcast on digital terrestrial television, has only recently published its financial report for 2023. The nearly PLN 4 million of net profit generated in this period is to be added to its reserve capital.

title: Zbigniew Hołdys returns with his columns
description: Musician Zbigniew Hołdys began writing columns for the portal naTemat.pl (Glob360). Previously, he had been a columnist for the weekly "Newsweek Polska" for a dozen or so years.

title: Biedronka's marketing manager in the anniversary ad
description: The Biedronka chain of stores (Jeronimo Martins Polska) has launched a nationwide campaign to celebrate its 30th anniversary in Poland. The heroine of the ads telling the story of the brand is the chain's marketing manager Dorota Wrotek-Gut.

title: "A Wife for a Pole" is Sunday's hit on TVP1
description: After "The Farmer Wants a Wife" and "Sanatorium miłości", it's time for "Żona dla Polaka". The first episode of the new dating program on TVP1 was watched by an average of 1.11 million viewers - according to Nielsen data.

title: "Design Alive" has a new editor-in-chief
description: Martyna Bednarska-Ćwiek has been appointed editor-in-chief of the magazine “Design Alive”. She has worked in its editorial office for over 3 years.

title: Michał Czernecki in Blik's commercial with a sense of humor about transaction security
description: Actor Michał Czernecki appears in Blik's new adverts. In historical costume, he presents advice on safe online transactions.

title: A bill that will not change anything. The Sejm begins work on the "rescue" Hołownia project
description: Legal Supreme Court judges are to rule on the validity of the presidential elections together with new judges - assumes the project of Marshal Szymon Hołownia. - I do not see the possibility of old and new judges ruling together, even if it were decreed by law - says one of the Supreme Court judges.

title: A strange transaction of the Dmowski Institute. Disappearing gold and a homeless man at the head of the company. The clues lead to the Łódź Fight Club
description: The sale of the building intended for the seat of the Dmowski Institute, finalized in June 2022, was a planned operation by a group of speculators originating from the Łódź Fight Club. The operation was led by a former tax official.

title: Winter in the city 2025
description: The winter break is fast approaching! We encourage students to spend this time actively. As every year, winter in the city happens during the school break, which this year in Warsaw falls between February 3 and 16. As part of our campaign, we have prepared free sports attractions in as many as 10 centers. Check out what offers you can take advantage of!

title: China's Double Game: Joins US Sanctions on Putin's Oil
description: A surprising move by Beijing.

title: Poland praised for decisive action. "The West should follow suit"
description: Jose Manuel Barroso appreciates Warsaw's policies.

title: Trump Wants to Expand US Territory. Doesn't Rule Out Use of Force
description: "Artificially drawn line."

title: Visa Scandal. NIK Head: Four Notifications to Prosecutor's Office
description: Marian Banaś in "Morning Guest".

title: ChatGPT Creator Charged with Rape, Sued by His Sister
description: “We feel tremendous pain.”

title: Visa Scandal. NIK Head: Four Notifications to Prosecutor's Office
description: – We have submitted four notifications to the prosecutor’s office about a suspicion of committing a crime regarding the visa scandal – said the president of the Supreme Audit Office, Marian Banaś, in “Gość poranka”.

title: He ran over a 13-year-old girl on a pedestrian crossing. Police found the perpetrator
description: He is an 80-year-old resident of Milicz.

title: Naval saboteurs have done their part. NATO begins deterrence operation
description: Additional submarines for patrol.

title: Los Angeles' celebrity district burns, tens of thousands evacuated
description: Firefighters cannot control the fire.

title: Trudeau criticizes Trump's words: 'Canada will never be part of the US'
description: Strong entry from the Canadian.

title: A story like from a movie. A homeless man, a beer friendship and a multi-million dollar operation
description: The Dmowski Institute, established during the PiS government, is in hot water. It's all because of the transaction concerning the sale of the building intended for its headquarters. From the findings of "Gazeta Wyborcza" we learn about a strange acquaintance made... over beer and millions of zlotys.

title: Małysz didn't hold his tongue. He spoke harshly about Żyła's attitude: It was a disaster!
description: Adam Małysz had strong words for Piotr Żyła's performance during the Four Hills Tournament. "He got himself into it," said the president of the Polish Ski Association in an interview with RMF FM. He added that Dawid Kubacki is showing signs of improvement.

title: Pole wanted for work in a unique place. The comments under the offer are a real frenzy!
description: The Polish Academy of Sciences published a job offer for an IT specialist on social media. The employee sought will also be a participant in the 48th Polar Expedition to Spitsbergen. The comments under the post were abuzz. One thing irritated Internet users.

title: Rutkowski changes his hairstyle. He will increase the tension: maybe I will adopt the style of Elvis Presley?
description: The end of an era? Krzysztof Rutkowski has just announced a metamorphosis of his iconic hairstyle. He recently surprised with a bold look straight from the 80s, now it turns out that he wants a radical change. His wife helped him make this difficult decision. "Maja and I recently thought about my hairstyle and I think we'll change something," he announced.

title: How to stop shoes from slipping on ice? A simple trick for winter, apply this to the soles
description: Winter is a beautiful but demanding time of year. In recent days, IMGW has been constantly issuing icy warnings, and sidewalks covered in ice can be a challenge even for the fittest. If you are concerned about your safety and are looking for a way to give your shoes better traction, we have a few proven tricks. Most of them are simple home remedies.

title: He visited a friend and his girlfriend. He was found dying. NEW FACTS
description: The tragedy that occurred on January 4th after 9:00 p.m. in a block of flats on Połtawska Street in Koszalin will certainly be remembered by the residents for a long time. That day, 32-year-old Artur Cz. from Białogard decided to visit his 29-year-old friend Haralampus T. and his partner, 21-year-old Martyna K.

title: Koroniewska read that she is a "perpetually neglected pathologist". She reacted sharply. She writes about "killing with words"
description: In the face of the omnipresent culture of hate on social media, Joanna Koroniewska decided to stand up for personal dignity, but not only that. The actress, who has to face mockery and uninvited "advice" from internet users on a daily basis, this time decided to take decisive action. Instead of individual responses to malicious comments, the star published a post that is a kind of manifesto against online hate.

title: Tourists in the Tatras trusted artificial intelligence. It could have resulted in a tragedy
description: Artificial intelligence can be useful in many situations, but it doesn't always work in the mountains. Sometimes it even gets in the way. Recently, tourists who were looking for a way to the Five Lakes Valley found out about this. They used the latest technology and regretted it. The Tatra Volunteer Search and Rescue had to intervene.

title: Not What You Wanted for Christmas? How to Get Rid of Gift Whammy?
description: Holidays, birthdays and other occasions are a time of joy, but also of gift-giving mishaps. Sometimes even the best intentions do not guarantee success. The wrong size, colour or completely different taste of the recipient can lead to a situation in which the gift causes consternation instead of joy. What to do then? Fortunately, there are several ways to deal with an unwanted gift. However, it is worth knowing the applicable regulations.

title: Exchange rates January 8. What's happening with the zloty? How much are the franc, dollar and euro?
description: How do the exchange rates look on January 8, 2025? We check how the Polish złoty (PLN) is doing on the FOREX currency market – against the US dollar (USD), euro (EUR), Swiss franc (CHF), British pound (GBP) and Hungarian forint (HUF). Check how much złoty (zł) you can get for popular currencies.

title: You keep it in your basement? Get rid of it immediately! Fines up to PLN 5,000
description: Basements in apartment blocks are convenient places to store less frequently used items, especially when there is a lack of space in the apartments. However, it should be remembered that not all items can be stored there. Failure to comply with the regulations may result in a fine of up to PLN 5,000.

title: Lauren Groff's novel "Wild Wilds": a book bigger than year-end summaries
description: Here is a revision of concepts fundamental to Western civilization – yet exceptionally subtle and nuanced. Time to read. Such wisdom does not tolerate din.

title: TomTom Traffic Index. Check the most congested cities
description: In 2024, it took drivers the longest to cover a 10 km stretch during rush hour in Wrocław – an average of 28 minutes and 56 seconds. It was slightly shorter in Poznań (27:04) and Łódź (26:06). Among the Polish cities included in the TomTom ranking, the highest level of congestion on the roads is in Łódź. Due to traffic jams alone last year, Łódź residents lost 110 hours. In the global ranking, the city in which it takes the longest to cover a 10 km stretch is Barranquilla in Colombia (36 minutes and 6 seconds). The most congested roads are in the capital of Mexico.

title: Macabre events that shook Łódź in the past PHOTOS. Łódź crimes heard all over the world.
description: The year 2018 began in Łódź - like many previous years - with a murder: in the back room of a pawn shop on Rzgowska Street, the 40-year-old owner of the shop, Mariusz P., was killed by a dozen or so stab wounds. A few hours later, his murderer, also 40, committed suicide by throwing himself under a train. There have been many crimes in recent decades that have shocked not only our city.

title: Here is the Fiat 126p in an electric version! Maluch Vision would be a jewel of the automotive industry! How do you like the iconic car in its new version?
description: Fiat 126p, the icon of Polish motoring, could return in a new edition as Fiat 126p Vision. Such a fully electric model, which would resemble the iconic "Fiacik" in its appearance, would certainly find many fans. In the gallery we present a proposal for the new Fiat 126 in an electric version!

title: Two Poles advanced to the decisive round of Australian Open qualifications
description: Maja Chwalińska and Kamil Majchrzak advanced to the third, decisive round of qualifying for the Grand Slam tennis tournament Australian Open in Melbourne. Maks Kaśnikowski was eliminated in the second.

title: NATO to Send Additional Ships to Baltic Sea to Protect Underwater Cables
description: Some 10 NATO ships will take part in a mission to protect underwater infrastructure in the Baltic Sea. They will sail close to cables and other installations to reduce the risk of further acts of sabotage in the region. The first ships will be at sea by the end of the week, and the operation is expected to last until April, Finnish radio Yle reported.

title: Body Worlds is controversial for many, but it has gathered a record number of viewers. Extraordinary exhibits of human bodies
description: Body Worlds is one of the most popular exhibitions in Europe. It is similar in Poland. The exhibits of human bodies captivate and encourage reflection. The exhibition includes over 150 real exhibits of human bodies in motion. See selected photos in our gallery.

title: Such correspondence is becoming more and more popular PHOTOS. When a neighbor writes to a neighbor and places a letter on the stairwell
description: More and more common are correspondences that neighbors write to their neighbors. Such letters are posted in various places on stairwells, in elevators, on entrance doors. The content is highly controversial. We present PHOTOS of these notes in our gallery.

title: The best MEMES about students that are on the web, hands down. Laughter is health. A truly gigantic dose of great humor
description: The best and definitely the funniest MEMES about students, lecturers and the academic year that has just started. See what is the funniest, what students laugh at.

title: Colorful costumes, masks and loud parties. This is what carnival in Poland used to look like. See the participants in the parties in old photos
description: Carnival is an incredibly joyful time, full of fun, parties and balls. Both children, teenagers and adults will find something for themselves. In different regions, the events are associated with different traditions and customs. Participants often paint their faces for the occasion and choose interesting costumes. See what carnival games looked like years ago.

title: Sanatorium in the Polish People's Republic. Here people are treated, but also lead social life. Sentimental journey to the Polish People's Republic sanatorium, see!
description: A stay in a sanatorium is not the same as drinking mineral water at home. In the times of the Polish People's Republic, trips to sanatoriums were very popular. Back then, it was easier to get a referral for a free stay in a sanatorium and people were happy to take advantage of this opportunity, especially during vacations and holidays. In the times of the Polish People's Republic, the standard of rooms was much lower than today, but that didn't bother anyone. Take a journey through time with us.

title: Here are new MEMES after President Andrzej Duda's statement on airplanes. More and more people will have airplanes!?
description: More MEMES are appearing on the Internet after President Andrzej Duda's statement. - More and more people will not only want to use air transport, but ladies and gentlemen, they will have their own planes - Andrzej Duda said on Monday. The Internet is in a frenzy, which results in hilarious MEMES - see them in our gallery.

title: It's unthinkable that someone lives like that. This is not a photomontage! Here are apartments for rent almost like from a Bareja film PHOTOS
description: A toilet in the kitchen? A bed over a bathtub? Yes. And these are not the inventions of comedy directors. Such apartments are offered, among others, for rent. We show the most interesting and funniest "cases" in the gallery. You simply have to see it!

title: This is what the winter of the century looked like in Poznań. The city was cleared of snow by excavators and bulldozers! See extraordinary photos from 1979 [08.01.2025]
description: The winter of 1978 and 1979 went down in history as one of the harshest in Poland. Poznań, like the rest of the country, struggled with extreme weather conditions. Frost and snow paralyzed the city, and heavy construction equipment stepped into action. See what this unusual winter looks like in archival photos.

title: A thousand years since the coronation of the King of Poland. Andruszkiewicz reveals what the government is planning
description: Tusk's government is not planning any serious celebrations of the 1000th anniversary of the coronation of the first king of Poland - warns PiS MP Adam Andruszkiewicz, who submitted an interpellation to the Ministry of Culture and National Heritage on this matter.

title: Presidency in a traffic jam
description: Bogdan Rzońca | The year 2025 began with the formal announcement that Poland holds the presidency of the EU and will govern it for six months.

title: Judge Laskowski: When I read this, I felt sorry for the Minister of Finance
description: Supreme Court Judge Michał Laskowski said that when he read the resolution of the National Electoral Commission on PiS, he "felt sorry" for Finance Minister Andrzej Domański.

title: "Not so green after all." Morawiecki publishes recording with Trzaskowski
description: Rafał Trzaskowski emphasizes that Mateusz Morawiecki as prime minister agreed to the Green Deal. The PiS politician once again responded to the mayor of Warsaw. This time he recalled his own statements.

title: "He should be shot." Owsiak revealed the content of the threats. Police are investigating the case
description: Jurek Owsiak published a post on social media in which he reported that he had been threatened. The case was reported to the police, who confirmed that they had initiated proceedings. What is known?

title: 12 Things You Definitely Recognize. Do You Know Their Names?
description: You've probably encountered them before, but do you know their names? Although this isn't a difficult knowledge quiz, only 1 in 8 quizzers gets a full set! Let's see if you can boast a score of 12/12!

title: Hate affair. The Supreme Court's sluggishness ties the hands of prosecutors. "The situation is stalemate"
description: The prosecutor's investigation into the hate scandal has reached a dead end. All because the neo-judges from the Supreme Court have still not dealt with the applications to lift the immunities. This makes it impossible to bring charges.
