description: On September 4 this year, during the XXXII International Defense Industry Exhibition in Kielce, another executive agreement was signed for the acquisition of Unmanned Aerial Systems (UAVs) of the mini FlyEye class. The subject of the contract concluded between the Armament Agency and WB Electronics S.A., worth approximately PLN 24 million gross, is the delivery of six FlyEye UAV sets to the Polish Armed Forces in 2024-2026.

title: MSPO 2024: Air bases will receive new radars
description: On the second day of the MSPO trade fair in Kielce, i.e. on September 4 this year, the Armament Agency signed an agreement with the Spanish company Indra Sistemas S.A. to acquire fifteen airport area control radar systems (RKRL), codenamed Drawa, which are to replace the currently used AVIA-W radars of this type. The total value of the contract (including the option) amounts to approx. PLN 1.1 billion gross and assumes the delivery of 8 systems under the basic order and another 7 systems under the option right, with deliveries in the years 2025-2031.

title: 04.12 Artillery Festival
description: On the day of Saint Barbara - the patron saint of artillery, we extend our best wishes to all artillerymen and rocketeers. May your actions always be precise, your decisions accurate, and every goal achieved. May your difficult and responsible mission always be met with due recognition, and may your professionalism,

title: Offer for sale of fixed assets – Huta Stalowa Wola S.A. Branch 1 in Stalowa Wola
The last company fire module RAK delivered by HSW
Another UMI 9.50 from HSW S.A. for the Polish Army
National Independence Day
description: November 11, 1918 is one of the most important dates in the history of Polish statehood. On that day, Marshal Józef Piłsudski became commander-in-chief of the Polish army, and an armistice was signed in Compiègne, France, which meant Germany's defeat in World War I. This balance of power…

title: Contract for accompanying vehicles for WR-40 Langusta signed
HSW S.A. in 1st place among Podkarpacie companies according to investment outlays of the Golden Hundred of Podkarpacie
Open Day at Huta Stalowa Wola S.A.
description: Huta Stalowa Wola S.A. invites you to an Open Day, during which the employer's offer for people who would like to use their knowledge and competences in work for the country's defense and security will be presented. Interested parties are asked to bring with them a current CV and

title: China's Currency Weakens Amid New Trade War With US, Yuan Responds to Trump's Return
description: Concerns about the growth prospects of the world's second largest economy, the strengthening of the dollar and the new occupant of the White House, who has made the introduction of tariffs on foreign goods - especially those from China - his campaign slogan. The yuan is facing many unfavorable factors that are dragging it down and is losing this fight for now. The sentiment among investors is also shown by the falling yields on Chinese bonds.

title: Lower Silesia on a Single Ticket? The Region Wants to Follow Germany's Lead
description: The German nationwide monthly ticket has proven to be a huge success. This solution has inspired not only ordinary people to change to the train, but also other countries and even individual regions to introduce similar tickets, such as Lower Silesia, which is also considering a similar solution.

title: Most companies plan to raise prices. "Consumption is strong, demand remains strong"
description: 57 percent of large and medium-sized companies plan to raise prices by 5-10 percent in the next 12 months - according to a study conducted by Grant Thornton.

title: "Zrywki" in Biedronka are not always free. When do you have to pay for them?
description: From this year, in Biedronka you have to pay for plastic bags, so-called "tear-off" bags, intended for packing products sold loose. This is only necessary when they are not used for their intended purpose, e.g. for packing pre-packaged products.

title: Marciniak: The situation regarding money for PiS is clear
description: The situation related to the resolution of the National Electoral Commission on the adoption of the report of the PiS election committee is unambiguous - said on Wednesday the chairman of the National Electoral Commission Sylwester Marciniak. As he said, if the resolution had been unclear, the National Electoral Commission would not have issued a letter informing about the obligation to pay money to the party.

title: We travel more and more often by PKP Intercity trains. An increase of 33% from 2022
description: PKP Intercity trains carried 78.5 million passengers last year, which is 15 percent more than the previous year and 33 percent more than in 2022 - the carrier announced in a press release.

title: China prepares ground for 'vaccine diplomacy'
description: The PRC authorities are promising some countries priority access to Covid-19 vaccines developed by Chinese companies or are offering them loans to buy the desired doses. Some commentators are seeing this as the beginning of Beijing's "vaccine diplomacy."

title: Dom Development sold 995 units net in Q3, up 6% YoY.
description: Dom Development Group sold 995 net apartments in the third quarter of 2020, which means an increase of 22 percent QoQ and 6 percent YOY - the developer informed in a press release. During this time, the Group delivered 692 apartments to clients, which is 18 percent less than a year earlier.

title: Yanok Mortgage Fund on the KNF warning list
description: The Yanok Mortgage Fund has been added to the KNF's public warning list, the Polish Financial Supervision Authority announced on Friday. This includes accepting cash deposits in order to expose them to risk.

title: BM PKO BP is the leader in turnover on the WSE stock market in September
description: In September 2020, BM PKO BP returned to the position of the leader in turnover on the stock market in GPW session transactions. The leader of the August ranking, Merrill Lynch, took second place - GPW reported on its website.

title: Still no Brexit deal
description: The European Union and Great Britain have not yet reached an agreement on the principles of trade between the countries - Łukasz Ambroziak, an expert from the Institute of Agricultural and Food Economics, told PAP. The United Kingdom is Poland's third largest trading partner, and in the case of food - the second.

title: Prime Minister: We are repairing and building thousands of kilometers of roads
description: We repair thousands of kilometers of roads, renovate, modernize, but also create new roads in all corners of Poland - said Prime Minister Mateusz Morawiecki during the opening of the road in the Wielkopolska province.

title: Austria has entered the second wave of the coronavirus epidemic
description: Austria has entered a "second wave" of coronavirus infections, Prime Minister Sebastian Kurz said on Sunday, drawing attention to the growing number of positive tests.

title: A difficult general knowledge QUIZ. Only the best will get 10/10. Will you be one of them?
description: Are you ready to test your knowledge of various fields of science? This quick general knowledge quiz will allow you to test how much you know. We have prepared 10 questions that cover topics from various scientific topics, including: literature, geology, physics, medicine, geography and chemistry. Will you score a full set of points? Test your knowledge!

title: Kurski hit out at Nitras. "No drugs or filing." The Minister of Sport responded
description: Jacek Kurski clashed with the Minister of Sports on social media. The former head of TVP used harsh words against Sławomir Nitras. The latter did not owe him anything and quickly responded in a blunt manner. And the whole storm was unleashed by the civic candidate for President of the Republic of Poland and President of the Institute of National Remembrance Karol Nawrocki.

title: 15 million drivers must go to the office. New obligation adopted
description: Drivers have a new obligation imposed on them by the amendment to the regulations. Do you have such a driving license? Up to 15 million people must go to the office. When should an application for replacement be submitted? The deadlines have already been set.

title: Up to PLN 17,000 for winter break for students. Check what conditions must be met!
description: The LOTTO Foundation named after Halina Konopacka has organised a competition "odLOTTOwe ferie 2025", in which you can receive funding of PLN 10,000 or PLN 17,000 for the organisation of stationary winter camps for primary school students. The offer is addressed to rural and urban-rural communes with up to 30,000 inhabitants.

title: Do you remember these cars from the Polish People's Republic? Score 8/10 only for experts
description: They were capricious, and their comfort was inferior to that of Western designs. Cars from the PRL are now a symbol of a bygone era, and nostalgia does not allow us to forget about them. Syrena, Fiat 125p, Nysa, Żuk - models once produced in thousands and millions of copies are now a real rarity on the roads. This quiz is a short journey back in time. How much do you know about motorization from the PRL era? A score above 8 points means that you are a real expert!

title: Forget about the declaration? You will pay a fine. This is the duty of every driver
description: It's not just the purchase of a car that gives rise to important obligations. In some situations, the sale of a car must be included in the PIT declaration submitted to the tax office. Drivers who forget to do this risk fines of thousands. The tax office will check whether the tax has been paid. Who has to remember it?

title: A dangerous virus has reached Europe. Fears of another pandemic
description: The presence of the HMPV virus, which is spreading very quickly in China, has been confirmed in Portugal. The virus manifests itself with symptoms similar to the flu and is particularly dangerous to children. Hospitals in China are overwhelmed, and the pathogen itself arouses great fear. What is known about it?

title: Ziobro stood up for Stoch. According to him, he is better than Małysz
description: Kamil Stoch has the best years of his sports career behind him. Our champion withdrew from the Four Hills Tournament, because in his current form he had no chance for a decent result. More and more often there are voices that he should retire. Jan Ziobro defends Stoch. The former Polish representative emphasizes that the 37-year-old deserves greater recognition and respect.

title: Good news for debtors. Bailiff will leave more in the account [NEW LIMITS]
description: From January 1, 2025, people in debt can breathe a sigh of relief. The amount free from bailiff seizure has increased to PLN 3,499.50, which is 75 percent of the minimum wage.

title: Jerzy Owsiak revealed that he received death threats. "Threats with a bomb in the background and disposal of my person"
description: Like every year, at the end of January, the Great Orchestra of Christmas Charity will play for the 33rd time. Unfortunately, the organizer of this great charity event, Jerzy Owsiak, is the subject of attacks. He fears for his safety. In a powerful post, he also referred to the tragic death of Paweł Adamowicz.

title: "Patriotic scam", homeless "a front". Who made money on the Dmowski Institute?
description: The sale of the building intended for the headquarters of the Dmowski Institute, finalized in June 2022, was a planned operation by a group of speculators led by a former tax official. The "front man" turned out to be a homeless man - reports "Gazeta Wyborcza" on Wednesday in an article titled "Patriotic Scam".

title: How Much is Gift Tax in 2025? New Limits Already in Force
description: A gift, like an inheritance, is subject to mandatory tax. Receiving an apartment, money or valuable items involves the need to settle accounts with the tax office. The amount of gift tax depends on the relationship, as well as the market value of the inheritance. Who must pay gift tax and what is the tax-free amount in 2025?

title: Norwegian ski jumper works as a night porter at a hotel
description: Benjamin Oestfold struggled with such serious financial problems. The Norwegian ski jumper, who thanks to good results in the Continental Cup was called up at the last minute to the Four Hills Tournament, is not afraid of any work. The 23-year-old recently worked in a factory, and recently took a job at a hotel as a night porter.

title: Iga Świątek will be lying on the beach before the Australian Open
description: Iga Świątek started her season by competing in the United Cup tournament. The competition in Sydney, where the Polish tennis team took second place, was very exhausting. That is why now the Polish player will lie on the beach to rest physically and mentally. "Before the Australian Open, Iga needs to regenerate" - emphasizes in an interview the coach of the vice-leader of the WTA ranking, Wim Fissette.

title: Functional illiteracy is on the rise. Sweden is phasing out laptops from schools and going back to paper
description: The Swedish government has declared a reading crisis, which it wants to combat, among other things, by returning to traditional textbooks and libraries instead of digital tools. Research shows that young Swedes have trouble understanding more complex texts, and universities are having to give up longer descriptions.

title: Recalculation of pension. Which age groups can gain even several hundred zlotys?
description: Does the amount of your pension not meet your expectations? It is possible to increase the benefit by submitting an application for recalculation to the Social Insurance Institution. This option is especially available to people born in certain years. Here are the details.

title: Below 18 degrees in school? When must classes be canceled? [REGULATIONS]
description: The issue of minimum temperature in schools raises questions especially in the autumn-winter period. Parents, teachers and students wonder what are the limits below which classes must be canceled. The regulations clearly regulate this issue, and in exceptional situations remote learning may be introduced.

title: These are the most congested cities in Poland. It's scary to go out on the road
description: Warsaw, Wrocław or Kraków are the most congested cities in Poland? It turns out that none of these metropolises even come close to the inglorious winner of the latest TomTom Traffic Index ranking, which was obtained by dziennik.pl. This Polish city is among the 10 worst in the world…

title: It earned 350 million. The cinema megahit will finally hit the Polish VOD platform
description: "Alien: Romulus", the latest installment of the cult science fiction series, quite unexpectedly turned out to be one of the biggest cinema hits of 2024. In November, news broke that the superproduction would hit Disney+ on November 21. And yes, it did. But not in Poland. However, in January it will finally happen. When exactly?

title: A tough quiz from the capitals of the world. Only a champion can get 12/12. Are you in this group?
description: Here's a new quiz on the capitals of the world. You'll probably wake up in the middle of the night and say that Rome is the capital of Italy and Berlin is the capital of Germany. However, some countries can test a little more. Can you answer all the questions correctly? Only geniuses will get 12 points. Good luck!

title: Do this simple ritual. You will attract money and wealth
description: This is a folk superstition that supposedly always works. It is supposed to ensure prosperity and good luck in finances. It will ensure that the person who does it will not lack money and prosperity. What exactly is it about?

title: Important NATO mission in the Baltic Sea. A team of 10 warships will go to sea
description: Around 10 NATO ships will take part in a special mission in the Baltic Sea. The first ships will be at sea by the end of the week, and the operation is expected to last until April.

title: UK economy back on the brink of collapse? Debt servicing costs at highest in almost 30 years
description: British bond yields have risen to their highest level since 1998. This means that the cost of servicing the British state's debt is rising rapidly - writes CNBC. Will the bond market crisis lead to a political earthquake like in 2023, when then-Prime Minister Lizz Truss was dismissed?

title: A foreign company does not have to have a plant in Poland to be a PIT payer
description: A foreign company that delegates employees to Poland must calculate, collect and pay advance tax on the salaries of delegated employees on an ongoing basis, even if it expects that its establishment will only be established in 12 months, the Supreme Administrative Court ruled.

title: The tax office boasts about the tax office's successes. Experts are reserved in assessing this data
description: In 2024, the National Revenue Administration detected the largest number of empty invoices since 2019. Moreover, as a result of its actions, taxpayers paid over PLN 15 billion to the budget, and the amount of their arrears decreased by PLN 3 billion from January to September 2024.

title: Koperski: Polish Waters are to protect against unjustified price changes [INTERVIEW]
description: - The draft bill is subject to ongoing consultations within the ministry's management, where, in addition to the Left, other political forces forming the government coalition are represented - says Przemysław Koperski, Undersecretary of State at the Ministry of Infrastructure.

title: Disputed temperature at work. There is no agreement in the government to change health and safety regulations
description: Complicated, unrealistic, paralyzing companies and even threatening state security - these are just some of the reservations of the ministries regarding the regulations regulating temperature in the workplace proposed by Minister Agnieszka Dziemianowicz-Bąk.

title: Litwiński: A private person publishing on the Internet is subject to GDPR [INTERVIEW]
description: - Just as in Molière's play, Mr. Jourdain spoke in prose the whole time, although he did not know it, we are all administrators of personal data, it's just that not all of us have been aware of it so far - notes Dr. Paweł Litwiński, attorney-at-law, partner at the Barta Litwiński law firm and member of the Social Team of Experts at the President of the Personal Data Protection Office.

title: From July 2025, trading in cryptocurrencies will require a permit
description: The Ministry of Finance announces that the delay in adopting the Polish act will not mean an additional year of peace for companies operating on the crypto-assets market.

title: Property tax 2025. Here are the most important changes
description: Entrepreneurs have an exceptional time this year until March 31 to declare property tax, but they must submit a special notification by the end of January. Owners of garages in residential buildings do not have to provide municipalities with any information in connection with the reduction in the tax rate.

title: Changes to civil servant exams postponed for a year. Even possible elimination of appointments
description: Changes to the exams for a civil servant will not appear until 2026, although they were already announced for this year. It is possible that it will not end with a modification of the exam itself; issues of the scope of duties of civil servants and even the elimination of appointments are also being considered.

title: Government tilting at windmills. Will the government fail to deliver on its pre-election promise?
description: Ministries are piling up difficulties in fulfilling their pre-election promise to reduce the distance of new wind turbines from buildings to 500 m.

title: They are accelerating work on biofuels. However, this is only a temporary solution
description: The delayed regulations are intended to adapt Polish law to EU requirements. Experts emphasize, however, that biofuels are only a temporary solution.

title: Lubnauer: Patostreaming will be included in the core curriculum [INTERVIEW]
description: - We are able to effectively combat children's addiction to smartphones and the dangers of the Internet only through education - says Katarzyna Lubnauer, Deputy Minister of Education.

title: Lex Romanowski to be amended. Amendment to the act raises doubts
description: The amendment to the act on the exercise of the mandate of a deputy and senator raises doubts not only among experts, but also among parliamentarians. As we hear, the inconsistencies are to be worked out in the committee.

title: The Polish government has presented a new position before the ECJ. It concerns the status of judges
description: The Polish government presented a new position on the status of judges to the Court of Justice of the EU on Tuesday. It wants the court to rule on the criteria for examining the independence of judges and the possibility for national courts to disregard provisions that limit the effectiveness of EU law.

title: Demi Moore Wins Golden Globe After Being Almost Quit Acting
description: I have been working in this profession for 45 years and this is my first award. I accept it with humility and gratitude – said a clearly moved Demi Moore, accepting the Golden Globe for her role in the film "The Substance". In her speech, she mentioned difficult experiences.

title: Ukrainian drones in the depths of Russia. Fire in the city where strategic bombers are stationed
description: Ukrainian drones attacked targets in several regions of Russia at night, including Saratov. A large fire broke out in the city of Engels.

title: Janusz Jankowiak: Will it be brighter? Don't exaggerate, too many unknowns in 2025.
description: If anyone was hoping that the economy would become clearer in 2025, they need to seriously revise their expectations.

title: CES 2025 This Technology Will Turn Everyone Into a Powerhouse: Work and Leisure in a New Way
description: You can already feel like Tom Cruise in the movie "Edge of Tomorrow". The start-up Hypershell has developed a solution that refers to this science fiction movie. An exoskeleton supported by AI gives superhuman powers.

title: The nationwide competition for students in family and inheritance law is starting
description: The Department of Civil Law at Nicolaus Copernicus University in Toruń, which has been organizing the largest faculty knowledge competition on family and inheritance law for over a dozen years, is expanding it this year to include students from all academic centers in Poland.

title: BMW revolutionizes car operation. Panoramic iDrive will appear this year
description: BMW has unveiled a new concept in car operation at the Consumer Electronics Show (CES) in Las Vegas. BMW’s first-ever panoramic iDrive system will define the in-car experience in the upcoming Neue Klasse. Market launch in late 2025

title: Major Los Angeles Fire: The Film Stars District Burns
description: In Pacific Palisades, more than 30,000 people have evacuated their homes as a fire engulfs the upscale Los Angeles neighborhood.

title: Ryanair CEO advises governments on how to boost tourism. Three resolutions for the new year
description: Abolishing aviation taxes, reducing air traffic control fees, solving the problem of delays resulting from air traffic controllers' strikes and lifting traffic restrictions - Ryanair has published a list of demands for EU governments if they want to develop aviation, tourism and create jobs.

title: Melting Antarctic Ice to Awaken Dormant Volcanoes? New Scientists' Study
description: Melting ice in Antarctica due to climate change could trigger volcanic eruptions beneath the continent's ice sheet. They may not be visible, but the heat they release will accelerate the melting of the ice. This will create a feedback loop. In the long term, this could contribute to rising sea levels.

title: Czarzasty strikes at his colleagues again. "Buy yourself a bigger mirror"
description: "If your whims and blockages in your heads..."

title: Today we will know the date of the presidential elections. Three possibilities
description: Formally, the elections will be called on January 15 – this date results from the provisions of the constitution.

title: National Electoral Commission Chief: I think that Domański will implement the resolution despite everything
description: "This results directly from the provisions of the law."

title: MARD ordered over 82 thousand apples. For the presidency
description: Polish apples have become the official fruit of the presidency and will be served to event participants.

title: REPORT. 1050th day of the war. Attack on Russian fuel depot
description: On the wPolityce.pl portal we report on events on the front lines.

title: The Roman Empire led to a decline in intelligence in Europe
description: Lead contamination in ancient Rome was so high that it led to a decline in intelligence in much of Europe, according to new research by American scientists. According to their estimates, the IQ of the Roman population in the first centuries of our era could have dropped by an average of 2.5-3 points.

title: Up to 100 percent growth. Dynamic changes in the largest cities
description: The number of available new apartments increased significantly in 2024 - Otodom reported. The report also indicated that at the end of last year, sales in the largest cities decreased by 26 percent year-on-year.

title: To avoid the building, he overturned a truck full of rubble.
description: A truck carrying rubble overturned on national road no. 79 in Koszyce (Małopolska Province). The road is completely blocked, and the police are directing traffic to detours.

title: At night she went out to drink hot tea. She walked over 20 kilometers along a busy route
description: A senior citizen from Siedlce County walked about 20 kilometers at night along a national road. When traffic police noticed her, she was disoriented and hypothermic. No one had paid her any attention or helped her before. The woman told the officers that she had gone to a gas station to drink hot tea.

title: They detected a specific smell on the ground floor. On the third floor, they discovered a cannabis plantation
description: Police officers from Bydgoszcz have detained a 28-year-old man who may be connected to the cultivation of cannabis and possession of a significant amount of dried plant material. When entering the building, the officers smelled marijuana. It turned out that there was a plantation on the third floor. The man is to face charges related to the cultivation of cannabis.

title: Frost in Mexico. One person died
description: Residents of northern Mexico are struggling with the effects of the second winter storm this season. The negative temperatures were brought by a front known locally as "Front 21". In the city of Chihuahua - the capital of the state of the same name - one person died of hypothermia.

title: A large column of fire, an airfield of strategic bombers nearby. Ukrainians attacked deep in Russia
description: Ukrainian drones have attacked Saratov and Engels in Russia, among other places - media and Russian authorities report. Footage published on social media shows a large fire at an oil depot in Engels, where Tu-95 bombers are stationed, among others.

title: She left a pot on the stove and fell asleep. Police officers took her out of the smoke-filled apartment
description: Police officers took part in a rescue operation in the middle of the night in Praga Północ, where an apartment had caught fire. They led a semi-conscious woman out of the apartment. It turned out that she had left a pot on the stove, which soon began to burn, and she had fallen asleep. Thanks to quick intervention, the 64-year-old did not suffer any injuries.

title: They rob cars, ransack houses. Thieves are returning to methods that have not been used for 20 years
description: Five minutes is enough to steal a car. It takes burglars from two to ten minutes to clear out a flat. The number of so-called "fast actions" is also increasing. "Old methods that have not been seen in Poland for the last 20 years are coming back," says a security specialist.

title: Secrets of parents of gifted children. They have a strategy that makes their little ones resolute
description: Children may have different talents, the expression of which depends on, among other things, personality, temperament, place of residence, sometimes disability or neurodiversity. Identification of these traits is the beginning of creative following of the child. How to raise a creative child? Encourage, encourage, or maybe observe and step into the background?

title: Virus from China reaches Europe. Patient describes symptoms of the disease
description: The dangerous HMPV virus has already reached Europe. Doctors have confirmed cases of infection in Portugal. However, the most serious situation is still in China, and the media is writing about scenes similar to the COVID-19 pandemic. Infection with the HMPV metapneumovirus can be very dangerous. People who have had contact with it recall problems with speaking and breathing.

title: Winter vacation without the crowds. There are secluded and unique places in Poland
description: Zakopane is a popular destination during the winter holidays. The queues for attractions there stretch for kilometres. What can you do to avoid the crowds of tourists? It is worth taking a look at the map and finding a place that offers everything that popular cities and resorts have, plus peace and quiet.

title: They encouraged residents to eat... Christmas trees. A controversial idea from the authorities
description: The Belgian Federal Food Agency (FASFC) has issued a warning to citizens that eating a Christmas tree can have tragic consequences, after the city of Ghent encouraged this method of disposing of the tree as part of its environmentally friendly measures.

title: More accidents and collisions on Polish roads. Police provide data
description: Last year, there were over 21.5 thousand road accidents on Polish roads, in which 1,881 people died and over 24.8 thousand were injured - according to police statistics. Compared to the previous year, the number of accidents increased, but there were fewer drunk drivers.

title: A truck collides with a train in Wielkopolska. Two people are injured.
description: Two people were injured in a collision between a truck and a train in Wielkopolska. The accident occurred on the route from Szydłów to Zawada in Piła County.

title: Tenement house explosion in Cieszyn. Identity of two victims confirmed
description: The identity of two people who died under the rubble of a collapsed tenement house in Cieszyn has been identified. They are a 46-year-old man and a 78-year-old woman - residents of the building.

title: Ukrainian Strike on Russian Air Force Base: Kremlin Responds
description: Ukrainian drones attacked a fuel depot in the city of Engels in the Saratov region in western Russia. A fire broke out there, and about 25 strong explosions could be heard - the independent Russian channel Astra reported on Telegram on Wednesday morning. There is a Russian strategic air base in Engels.

description: Sasin: the law is clear, funds must be paid to PiS

title: Should PiS receive funds? The National Electoral Commission chief makes the matter clear
description: Should PiS receive funds? The National Electoral Commission chief makes the matter clear

title: Threats against Owsiak and WOŚP. There is a reaction from the Ministry of Interior and Administration
description: There is an investigation into threats against Jerzy Owsiak and WOŚP - informed the spokesman for the Minister of Internal Affairs, Jacek Dobrzyński. The case is being handled by the Warsaw police. "There is no and never will be tolerance for spreading hatred" - wrote Dobrzyński.

title: Los Angeles Fire: Kamala Harris' Home in Danger
description: The fight against the fire in Pacific Palisades, a district of Los Angeles full of celebrity residences, is still ongoing. On Tuesday, in a few hours, the fire spread to 510 hectares. Tens of thousands of residents have been ordered to evacuate. According to NBC News, Kamala Harris' residence is also at risk.

title: Irregularities in RCL. PiS MP wants to waive his own immunity
description: Before the holidays, the spokeswoman for the Prosecutor General, Prosecutor Anna Adamiak, informed that Prosecutor General Adam Bodnar had submitted applications to the Sejm to lift the immunities of Jan Krzysztof Ardanowski and Krzysztof Szczucki. In the case of Szczucki, Prosecutor Adamiak reported that when he was president of the Government Legislation Center, he employed people he indicated in the established Department of Education and Communication without a competitive procedure. Additionally, these people did not work for the RCL and instead "provided assistance to the MP in his election campaign by organizing meetings and undertaking promotional activities." In the program "Tłit" WP, the PiS MP spoke on this matter. - I want to clear my name as soon as possible and I hope that the prosecutor or the court will honestly listen to what I have to say and the case will be closed once and for all - said Szczucki. The host of the program, Michał Wróblewski, asked if the politician intends to waive his immunity. - I am inclined to do so, it will probably be so. I only received an application to waive my immunity this week, so I am still in the process of analyzing it - replied the guest of the program. He explained that he wanted to clarify this matter anyway, so "involving the entire Sejm in this makes no sense". Referring to the allegations, Szczucki stated that it is "absolutely untrue". - This is the thesis that allegedly RCL employees did nothing, which is absolutely untrue, this notorious department, about which so much is said, organized numerous trainings, workshops, seminars - he added.

title: Scandal in the Church. Father Henryk Sz. faces 15 years in prison
description: Henryk Sz., a priest teaching religion at a school in the Oława commune (Lower Silesia), will be held accountable in court for sexually abusing an underage student. The man faces up to 15 years in prison.

title: Szydło supported Nawrocki. Behind the scenes of the PiS staff movement. "There will be no replacement"
description: Despite rumors about Beata Szydło's grand return to the presidential campaign of the candidate supported by PiS, the former prime minister will not take up any formal function in either the campaign team or the support committee - Karol Nawrocki's campaign staff tell Wirtualna Polska. As they emphasize: at least not in the near future. - There will be no replacement of the candidate - they add.

title: They are threatening to kill Owsiak. The police have taken up the case. "We are conducting activities"
description: The head of WOŚP Jurek Owsiak published an entry in which he reported threats directed at him. The incident was reported to the police. The Warsaw Police Headquarters confirms that it is conducting activities in this case.

title: Incident involving a soldier in Mielnik. Commander speaks out
description: On New Year's Day in Mielnik there was a dangerous incident involving a 24-year-old soldier who shot at a civilian car. As reported by RMF24, the perpetrator was under the influence of alcohol. The investigation is to explain the motives of his actions.

title: Incredible Aerial Photos: Fire Devastates LA Area
description: The horror in California continues. Strong winds are helping the fire spread quickly in the Pacific Palisades seaside district in Los Angeles. Tens of thousands of people have been evacuated, many others are trapped in their homes, unable to contact emergency services. According to the media, this is the worst fire in LA's history. The photos and footage of the element are terrifying.

title: Return to Poland B in the new Netflix series. Review of "Dog Hill"
description: In the fall of 2023, Netflix debuted "Informacja zwrotna". However, this is not the end of the adaptation of Jakub Żulczyk's prose. This time, the platform has released a five-episode series "Wzgórze pies". The script was written by the author of the novel together with director Piotr Domalewski. The series tells the story of difficult returns to the family home and life in the so-called B. Poland.
